Be sure to try Terminal Velocity mode after you practice!

Up=Red,  Right=Green,  Down=White,  Left=Blue.

Press (P) to Pause.

game.title: The Osiris Conflict

The Osiris Conflict" is a turn based isometric strategy game.
Guide your agents through 25 levels, using cover and utilising your agents' strengths and weaknesses. As you go through the levels you can rescue captured agents who can then help you on your mission and find more powerful weaponary.
Hopefully you can capture the terrorist "Marc Osiris", and put a a stop to his private army and whatever evil plan he has got going on.
Features: 25 characters all with their own unique stats and voices. 25 different weapons including shotguns, assault rifles and sniper rifles. 25 different levels requiring different strategies.
Also Features "Defence Mode"

game.title: Conquerium

Or just click like a pro.

game.title: Journey To The Chaos: SanZang Run!

Where is here? Oh35;8230; It occurred to me that Bodhisattva asked me to participate in a match called Journey to the West.
Monk Sanzang is sent into a haunted place full of zombies. He's only chance is to run away as fast as he can and pray that he will be rescued.
game.instructions: If it's your first time playing this game, please enter your nickname in the "New Player" field. You will play a tutorial level to help you get familar with game's basic controls. Click "New Game" to begin. If you already have a user ID and level password, use them to return to the level you were on. Remember your User ID and Level Code to jump to any level you have already passed.

game.title: Spring Marbles

game.title: Galaxy Wars: For the Sake Of the Universe
game.description: A retro-inspired space adventure with a unique control scheme that puts a new spin on a classic genre.
game.instructions:
Controls:
Mouse - Move Ship
Left Mouse Button - Pulse Weapon
Space - Pause/Upgrade
Galaxy Wars: For the Sake of the Universe will test your hand-eye coordination as you dodge the enemy hoard, your weapon orbiting around you destroying everything it contacts! Your ship's wormhole drive allows it to move at impossible speed, use your mouse to move about the screen.
You movements cause your weapon to gravitate around you. Subtle mouse movements give you more control, allowing you to orbit your weapon in small circles.
Time your pules attacks to take out chunks of enemies. Bounce your weapon around the screen
Collect the blue XP pieces to upgrade your ship and weapon.

game.title: Phoenix
game.description:

If the game lags, try turning the particles off before setting the quality.
game.instructions: Move with the mouse and shoot fireballs with the left mouse button.

game.title: Princess Saver
game.description: Far far away there is a lonely tower. And, of course, you have to destroy it. Why?.. Because a beautiful princess is waiting for you there?.. Nooo, because it's fun! By the way, try not to kill the princess and catch her. She may be usefull later35;8230;
game.instructions:
Aim with mouse, hold to gain power!
Mini games:
Left and Right Arrows: move

game.instructions: Move the mouse to position your horse and click to swing. chop heads and avoid letting villagers get away to keep your havoc bar filled. Try to get more than one villager in a single swing!

and M to mute
And don't forget that you can select gameplay atmoshere in right-top corner of the screen while preloading

game.instructions: Click to open your wings and move up. Release to close them and move down. Avoid running into the ceiling or floor. Run into flowers, bugs, and jellyfish to replenish the energy in your wings or you will begin to lose lift!

Drop balls on the balance. 
Every ball has a set weight so drop them wisely
Balls affect the balance according to their distance from the fulcrum.
Match three (or more! great bonus!) balls of the same color horizontally or vertically to make them disappear.
Let the balance hit the ground and it’s game over.
There are three rare powerups but their effects are unknown
game.instructions: Move the balls with mouse, drop them with mouse button

game.title: Grey Life
game.description:
Navigate through a series of dangers like mines, lasers and rockets while opening the gate and getting to it in each level. A remake of Project Green, with massive improvements. Features an interesting highscoring system in the multiplayer with replays.
There seems to be glitches on this site with connecting to my server and Stage height/width.. I'll be working on that.
I may start work on the third and final version of this game soon, as I have accumulated enough programming skills to make it awesome now.
I'll create a blog on my site in the next few days for people with ideas to explain them. So far I understand that the game needs to be:
Easier, Less Glitchy, Have a better editor and HAVE MUSIC.
We'll see how that goes.
game.instructions: Arrow keys or WASD to move the orb. Open the gate in each level by touching the blue button.

game.title: Bounce
game.description: Bounce, is an arcade-style action game in which players have to activate all orange balls in play by knocking into them. Your means of control is a grappling hook, and a few different power-ups to aid you. Avoid the walls.
game.instructions: Aim with the mouse, click once to shoot grappling hook, and press again to reset/remove the hook. Hook onto balls to gain momentum and manoeuvre around the playing field by springing from ball to ball. Players will be awarded points by activating all balls on the field as quickly as possible (the faster, the more points will be awarded). Lives are lost by hitting the boundary walls or being sucked into a black hole.

Valid words must consist of at least three letters and follow british or american spelling. No proper nouns.
Letters can be pressed or typed in any order, and only the last letter can be withdrawn.
For good touch-typers, keyboard controls are recommended!

- Slide into other penguins to knock them off the edge.
- The polar bear won't leave until he's eaten his fill, unless you bug him with your beak.
- Don't let your guard down, there are a few surprises lurking in the water.

Have fun :D

Run, jump, fly, eat food, gain weight and crush everything on your path.

press spacebar or click anywhere to fly and avoid obstacles

game.title: The Endless Drop

This one is more of an art project. Put on your thinking caps.

Sci-fi “run & gun” platformer game. This is a story about enhanced soldiers confrontation.
Take control over enhanced soldier and lead her through 21 game level, wiping out all enemies on your way.
You can make 18 upgrades to unlock new abilities and earn 24 achievements.

You can reconfigure it in options menu.
A/D – movement
W – jump/double jump (when learned)

game.title: Wrap Attack

Doctor Zass brings all the toys to life and sets them free so this year nobody will receive presents from Santa! But a boy named Tommy finds Santa’s lost wand. He decides to get the toys back and rescue Santa!
game.instructions:
WASD/ARROWS:  Move, Jump and crouch down.
Z/J:  Shoot a toy repeatedly to stop it moving and wrap it up, then run over it to collect the gift.
X/K:  Make an ice platform. Create them to get gifts and precious from the unreachable places.

game.title: Orbitron
game.description:
Defend your Orbit by building up an impenetrable stronghold and hold back the enemy waves!
Inspired by Space Invaders and Tetris, Orbitron is a mix between a shooter and a defense game. Prove your shooting and defense building skills in 34 challenging levels!
Tips:
Focus on staying alive rather than chasing down every enemy; Your Orbit has 40 lives and can be easily repaired, while you only got 3.
Only killing will earn you money; so don't just build walls and let the enemies collide, you will soon run out of money.
Build strategically; build non-permeable walls under your turrets, if you're afraid of shooting them. Also, an Amplifier above a Turret is also a good idea.
[Update 23.10.07] - fixed the bug at the end of game

Be warned: Hard to play on a laptop / trackpad!

game.title: Twisted Military
game.description:
Shoot up the enemy, pick up special weapons, and blast your way through 6 intense battles based on the story from Renegade Commanders. This epic driving game has tons to offer with unlockable game perks and Stamina Modes that allow you to compete for high scores. This game is highly addictive and is packed with instant action!
The game uses a classic mode7 3D effect to bring the early console action feel to the web. The playing experience is pretty intense with glass shattering explosions and in your face bullet holes.
The story line takes you into the mind of a soldier stuck in the Renegade war (for the full story play Renegade Commanders). Your fellow soldiers suddenly turn Renegade (almost too suddenly to be normal) and you must fight your way to destroy every last one of them.
I had a lot of fun developing the game. Have fun playing!
game.instructions:
Use arrow keys to accelerate, turn, and brake/reverse
Use [space] to fire machine gun
Use [w] to lay mine (when collected)
Use [s] to fire electric shock (when collected)
Use [a] and [d] to change electric shock target

game.title: Platcore
game.description:
What is Platcore?! Well Platcore is a platformer/avoid style of gameplay, you play as a Platbot which is a testing robot for Platcore, and Platcore will be using you to test out their newest products, which come in the form of things which aren't exactly your friend (Lasers, turrets, even bigger lasers, and evil things!). You play in a test chamber and your sole aim is to stay alive and survive the testing procedures, remember though, your robot is dispensable so there are MANY robots to play as if yours gets destroyed.
The games soundtrack is synced up to the Platcore AI, so when the soundtrack goes boom, something else is going boom, and it's likely to hit you in the face.
So this has been in development for quite a while in 2011 and has had a crazy rollercoaster ride in the development process as I ended up quitting my job mid-development so I could work full time on what I love; Giving you guys content! And then the sponsorship process was a rollercoaster in itself of a few months negotiating and falling through deals so I'm like extactic to be able to release this. And I hope you like it as much I as did developing it!
If you chose the wrong control scheme, just reload the game and you'll be able to pick it again! :)
Be warned, if you skip through the tutorial - you can't get it back without deleting your save file! So read!
game.instructions:
Arrow keys to move
Z to Jump
X to Shield
Store your Platbots in the Hall of Fame.
Customise your Platbots in the Lab.
If you're experiencing lag - right click and turn the quality down! This is important as a few people experience lag for a reason unknown to me!

Flight Simulator C130 puts you in command of one of the most famous military flying airplane ever to take to the skies! Never before have you experienced a military flight simulation training game like this one! The game features fantastic terrain, unbelievably realistic physics and largely varying weather, including lightning! 2) First Flight

15) Urban Flying
16) Hurricane Bertha
17) Above Ground
18) Fire Fighter
19) Stall Recovery Training
20) Secret Agent Sky Transfer
Can you complete all 20 before we release 20 more missions!

*** STILL TO COME ***
- Realistic Crashes
- Map Navigation
- Tilt Control Option
- Numerous Camera Angles 
- 20 More Exciting Missions
*** Fixes To Current Version ***

game.description: Mini Golf Islands is a sports game like no other. You have to hit the golf ball into the hole like many others. However the stunning graphics and unique holes make this game truly stand out from others before it. 20 unique and challenging levels, set on 4 islands await you. Can you finish them all under par?
game.instructions: Use the mouse to aim. Click to start the power meter moving, then click again to hit the ball.

game.title: Carrot Fantasy Extreme 2
game.controls: Place defenses - Use mouse to place defenses on the screen.
game.description: Carrot Fantasy Extreme 2 is a fantasy-themed tower defense game! Defend your Carrot from undersea monsters by building various weapons along the enemies path to help slow down and destroy the enemies. Each creature has a different ability, so use your weapons wisely. You can also upgrade your weapons to make things easier! Don't forget to destroy surrounding objects as they may be hiding secret weapons.
game.instructions: Place defenses - Use mouse to place defenses on the screen.

game.title: Carrot Fantasy Extreme 3
game.controls: Place defences - Use mouse to place defences on the screen.
game.description: Carrot Fantasy Extreme is a fantasy-themed tower defense game!  Protect your carrot from various monsters by placing different creatures along the path to help slow down and attack enemies.  Every creature has a different ability, so place them wisely.  You can also upgrade them to help make things even easier!  Don't forget to destroy your surroundings so you can make more room for defenses!
game.instructions: Place defences - Use mouse to place defences on the screen.

game.title: Valet Parking 3D
game.controls:
Accelerate - Up arrow key.
Reverse - Down arrow key.
Turn left/right - Left or right arrow keys.
game.description: Valet Parking 3D is a 3D parking game! The goal of the game is to park as many cars as you possibly can before the timer runs out! The more cars you park, the more money you make. Just make sure you park the car where the customer asks you to, or you'll forget which car to bring back when the customer returns to pick it up!
game.instructions:
Accelerate - Up arrow key.
Reverse - Down arrow key.
Turn left/right - Left or right arrow keys.

game.title: The Three Towers
game.controls:
Fire - Hold down the left mouse button.
Navigate through the menu - Use the mouse.
game.description: The Three Towers is a tower defense game. The goal of the game is to defend your pizza from the hungry insects by using your three towers to take them down! You control one tower yourself, while the other two automatically fire at the enemy. Use the money earned by defeating enemies to heal and upgrade your towers! A useful hint would be to be prepared, not all enemies follow the normal path!
game.instructions:
Fire - Hold down the left mouse button.
Navigate through the menu - Use the mouse.

game.title: No Mutants Allowed
game.controls:
Aim and fire - Move the mouse cursor over an enemy.
Special attacks - 1, 2, and 3 numbers keys
game.description: No Mutants Allowed is a challenging, frantic, fast-paced action game! After a post-nuclear breakout, mutants are emerging from their depths, crawling to the surface and rampaging across the desert towards the city! Defend your base, using your best shooting skills, building up a small army, and learning new abilities. The safety of the city is on your shoulders!
game.instructions:
Aim and fire - Move the mouse cursor over an enemy.
Special attacks - 1, 2, and 3 numbers keys

game.title: Apocalypse Transportation
game.controls:
Accelerate - Right arrow key
Nitro - Spacebar
Move cargo - Mouse
game.description: Apocalypse Transportation is a challenging, balance-based driving game in which you take control of a supply truck during a time when the world is on the verge of an apocalypse! People are being hoarded up in bunkers for safety, but they need supplies - and fast! You're their only hope, so stock up, and make sure you get as many resources to you can to the bases before you run out of gas! Just be careful, it's all too easy to drop your cargo, so take it slowly, and be sure to upgrade your truck for more space!
game.instructions:
Accelerate - Right arrow key
Nitro - Spacebar
Move cargo - Mouse

game.title: Dirt Bike 3D
game.controls:
Accelerate - Up arrow key
Tilt left/right - Left/Right arrow keys.
Restart level - R key
Pause - P key
game.description: Dirt Bike 3D is a 3D dirt bike game. The goal of the game is to ride your way through twenty increasingly challenging obstacle courses as fast as you can, without falling off your dirt bike!  Some advice from us would be to make sure you use your jumping ability often, it can help you cross large gaps, and sometimes free you from tight spots!
game.instructions:
Accelerate - Up arrow key
Tilt left/right - Left/Right arrow keys.
Restart level - R key
Pause - P key

game.title: Siege of Troy 2
game.controls:
Aim and fire - Use mouse to aim, hold and release mouse to fire.
Select special attack - Q,W,E keys.
game.description: Siege Of Troy 2 harkens the return of the classic archery game series!  Troy is under threat once again, and the enemy is stronger than ever before!  Fortunately, so are you!  Your technology has advanced immensely since the last war, and now you have some real firepower on your side!  Huge volleys of flaming arrows, burning rocks, and landscape-tearing boulders.  So long as you keep your aim sharp, and your timing perfect, you can win this war once again!
game.instructions:
Aim and fire - Use mouse to aim, hold and release mouse to fire.
Select special attack - Q,W,E keys.

game.title: Captain Nutty
game.controls: Movement - Use the mouse cursor to move
game.description: Captain Nutty is a fun, frantic shooting game, in which you must guide an eager, adventurous squirrel on his quest for the golden acorn! Blast through the skies, shooting all obstacles in your way, collecting coins, power-ups, acorns and fuel to keep you going.  Use your coins to buy upgrades; better weapons, better fuel consumption and faster rockets will go a long way to help you achieving your goal!
game.instructions: Movement - Use the mouse cursor to move

game.title: Carrot Fantasy 2: Undersea
game.controls: Place Structures - Use the mouse.
game.description: Carrot Fantasy 2: Undersea is a sea-themed tower defense game.  The goal of the game is to protect your carrot from being eaten by sea monsters by creating different structures along their path, to attack the enemy.  You can also attack the surrounding area to pick up treasure, and to make space for more structures!  Make sure the enemies don't reach the carrot, if it takes enough hits, you'll lose!  Don't forget, you can also upgrade your towers to make them more powerful!
game.instructions: Place Structures - Use the mouse.

game.title: Zombie Impaler
game.controls: Hold the left Mouse button over the Bow and move the Mouse to aim. Release to fire an Arrow.
game.description: Zombie Impaler is an Archery game that follows the ever-growing epidemic of Zombies that have risen from the dead within the confines of a small scenic village. Use your Bow and Arrow to eradicate the undead before they have a chance to escape. Aim for the head to boost your score. Make every shot count as the fate of the world rests on your Shoulders!
game.instructions: Hold the left Mouse button over the Bow and move the Mouse to aim. Release to fire an Arrow.

game.title: Ninja Training Worlds
game.controls:
A and D to move left and right.
W and S to move up and down ladders.
Space to jump.
Press Space twice to double jump.
P to Pause.
M to Mute.
game.description: Ninja Training Worlds is a side-scrolling action platform game in which you need to complete a series of ancient Ninja challenges. Guide your Ninja through each challenge by dodging and defeating enemies, jumping from wall to wall, dashing under spikes and collecting gold coins. You'll need to collect all gold coins and defeat all of the enemies to get the highest score!
game.instructions:
A and D to move left and right.
W and S to move up and down ladders.
Space to jump.
Press Space twice to double jump.
P to Pause.
M to Mute.

game.title: Carrot Fantasy 2: Desert
game.controls: Place defences - Use mouse to place defences on the screen.
game.description: Carrot Fantasy 2: Desert is the colourful, fun sequel to the challenging defences game, Carrot Fantasy!   With more weapons at your disposal than ever, your objective is to protect your somewhat delicious carrot from being eaten by all sorts of nasty, monstrous foes!  With limited funds, you've got to be at the top of your game to make the most of your defences, so think about where you place them!
game.instructions: Place defences - Use mouse to place defences on the screen.

game.title: Frontline Defender
game.controls:
Shoot - Use mouse to aim, left click to fire.
Reload weapon - R key.
Payload - W key.
Pan camera left/right - A/W keys respectively.
Throw grenade - Q key.
Select weapon - 1-9 number keys.
Pause - P key.
game.description: Frontline Defender is an action-packed strategy-shooter game!  Your city is under siege from enemy troops and things look desperate as your soldiers have fallen back, with only a small barricade to protect them.  Everything's on your shoulders now!  Pick up the slack of your fellow soldiers and shoot any remaining enemies upon sight!  It's time to shape up your soldiers, tighten up your defenses and sharpen your aim as you defend the ruins of your once glorious city!
game.instructions:
Shoot - Use mouse to aim, left click to fire.
Reload weapon - R key.
Payload - W key.
Pan camera left/right - A/W keys respectively.
Throw grenade - Q key.
Select weapon - 1-9 number keys.
Pause - P key.

game.title: The Boomlands: World Wars
game.controls: Select troops - Use mouse cursor
game.description: The Boomlands: World Wars is an interesting twist on the strategy genre! Gather resources and guide your men to battle, to take over the opposing king's castle! Watch out though, they're trying to do the same to your king, and you've got to think fast to break through. The key is to build up a good rhythm between gathering resources, deploying soldiers, and allowing your resources to grow back!
game.instructions: Select troops - Use mouse cursor

game.title: Qubilz
game.controls: Select and place blocks - Left-click on a block to select it, move your mouse around to move it on the screen, and then click again to place the block.
game.description: Qubilz is a fun, challenging, physics-based puzzle game; in which your goal is to build a structure from a limited number of jello blocks... and then endure a pummeling from those devious black balls! Stack your tower as high as possible for an even better score, just make sure to make it as stable as you can; you might be able to build a tower, but there's no guarantee that it'll survive the rain if it's not structured properly!
game.instructions: Select and place blocks - Left-click on a block to select it, move your mouse around to move it on the screen, and then click again to place the block.

game.title: Priest Vs Evil
game.controls:
Move left/right - Left/right arrow keys.
Jump - Up arrow key.
Attack - "L" key.
game.description: Priest Vs Evil is a crazy action game packed with holy retribution and gore galore! The evil undead have risen from their graves, taking your town by storm and infecting the locals with their grotesque disease. You're no peace-loving pastor, though; you're a vengeful priest who's not afraid to get his hands dirty to save the town! Pick up every weapon you can, from baseball bats to flamethrowers in your mission to bring evil to its knees!
game.instructions:
Move left/right - Left/right arrow keys.
Jump - Up arrow key.
Attack - "L" key.

game.title: War Elephant 2
game.controls:
Move elephants - Use arrow keys, or click directional arrow buttons.
Summon squads - Press viking/archer buttons.
Fire arrows - Press the various arrow buttons on the left
Charge elephant - Press elephant button
game.description: War Elephant 2 is the long-awaited sequel to War Elephant! This time a new foe has invaded your borders: the formidable, bloodthirsty Crusades! Their numbers are vast, and their artillery makes them a force to be reckoned with. Guide your army to victory, with your trusty war elephant on the front line, using your wits and strategic expertise to select the right units to send forth! They might have the numbers, but you have experience and tact on your side!
game.instructions:
Move elephants - Use arrow keys, or click directional arrow buttons.
Summon squads - Press viking/archer buttons.
Fire arrows - Press the various arrow buttons on the left
Charge elephant - Press elephant button

game.title: Cobra Striker
game.controls:
Move - W,A,S,D keys
Aim and shoot - Use the mouse cursor to aim, left click to shoot
Change weapons - 1,2 and 3 number keys
game.description:
Cobra Striker is an action packed 3D helicopter shooter game. Take on a variety of missions from hostage rescue to destroying the enemy base. Use a variety of weapons from a mounted machine gun to rockets, against a vast range of enemy units. Blow up tanks, soldiers and even some bunker type structures.
Make sure you are avoiding enemy attacks as they do shoot back, strafe left and right to avoid enemy fire of just do what the helicopter does best and blow them up before they get a chance to do any real damage.
game.instructions:
Move - W,A,S,D keys
Aim and shoot - Use the mouse cursor to aim, left click to shoot
Change weapons - 1,2 and 3 number keys

game.title: Quad Trials 2
game.controls:
Accelerate - Up Arrow Key
Decelerate - Down Arrow Key
Tilt left/right - Left/Right Arrow Keys respectively
game.description: Quad Trials 2 is the second instalment of the popular physics-based quad-bike driving game! With tracks more dangerous and challenging than ever, you'll have to test your skills to the limit to get to the finishing line quickly. Timing is key when there's moving platforms around, and keeping an eye on your surroundings is essential, so stay sharp!
game.instructions:
Accelerate - Up Arrow Key
Decelerate - Down Arrow Key
Tilt left/right - Left/Right Arrow Keys respectively

game.title: 18 Wheeler 3D
game.controls:
Accelerate - Up arrow key
Decelerate/reverse - Down arrow key
Turn left/right - Left/right arrow keys
Change camera - 1,2 and 3 number keys
game.description: 18 Wheeler 3D is one of the most challenging truck sim games around! Drive your way through ten levels, testing your driving skills to the limit. Weave through tight streets, crowded corners and sharp turns as you make your way to the parking bay - no easy feat when you have a heavy trailer following in your wake!  Key is to take your time, and be sure to take advantage of your camera to get through the tight spots.
game.instructions:
Accelerate - Up arrow key
Decelerate/reverse - Down arrow key
Turn left/right - Left/right arrow keys
Change camera - 1,2 and 3 number keys

game.title: Bus Controller
game.controls: Guide buses - Left-click on a bus to begin drawing a line, and while holding it down, drag the mouse to where you would like the bus to go.
game.description: Bus Controller is a chaotic management game in which you're in control of a bustling city's bus interchange! Guide the fleet of buses to their respective stations without causing a crash! The more buses there are on the road, the crazier things get, so be sure park the buses as soon as you can, otherwise you'll lose control, and it'll all end in disaster!
game.instructions: Guide buses - Left-click on a bus to begin drawing a line, and while holding it down, drag the mouse to where you would like the bus to go.

game.title: Wheelie King
game.controls:
Accelerate - Up arrow key.
Decelerate - Down arrow key.
Tilt left/right - Left/right arrow keys respectively.
game.description: Wheelie King is the ultimate wheelie endurance game! Keep your balance and manage your pace as you aim to perform the longest wheelie of all time! Endure humps and drops as you struggle against gravity. One false move and you'll be crashing into the ground! Lucky for you however, you have three lives at your disposal, so make the most of them!
game.instructions:
Accelerate - Up arrow key.
Decelerate - Down arrow key.
Tilt left/right - Left/right arrow keys respectively.

game.title: School Bus Racing
game.controls:
Accelerate - Up arrow key
Decelerate - Down arrow key
Turn left/right - Left/right arrow keys
Nitro - Space
game.description: School Bus Racing is a fun racing game that shows you just what school bus drivers get up to once their work is done! Weld on your nitro boosters, and race your way through ten increasingly challenging courses on your road to being the king of school bus racers! Buses aren't as nimble or manoeuvrable as your average car however, so take care when turning those tight corners!
game.instructions:
Accelerate - Up arrow key
Decelerate - Down arrow key
Turn left/right - Left/right arrow keys
Nitro - Space

game.title: Sim Taxi London
game.controls:
Accelerate - Up arrow key
Turn left/right - Left/right arrow keys
Reverse - Down arrow key
Brake - Spacebar
Select upgrades - Mouse
game.description: Sim Taxi London is bringing the classic taxi-driving game to an all-new location! Drive passengers to their destination, dodging cars, weaving past buses and taking tight turns! Make sure you take the shortest route you can, because if you take too long, your passengers won't pay you, and worse still, you'll waste precious gas! Best be careful too, because if your taxi takes too much damage, you'll have to pay for the repairs, too!
game.instructions:
Accelerate - Up arrow key
Turn left/right - Left/right arrow keys
Reverse - Down arrow key
Brake - Spacebar
Select upgrades - Mouse

game.title: Wrestling Legends
game.controls:
Move around the ring - Arrow keys
Punch - A key
Kick - S
Heavy punch - A and S keys together
Drop kick - D + left or right arrow keys
Choke - D + up arrow key
Body slam - D + down arrow key
Special move - W and S keys together
Head stomp - S key while enemy is on the ground
Raise enemy - W key while enemy is on the ground
Slam enemy into the ropes - Down and S keys together
game.description: Wrestling Legends is the ultimate challenge for wrestling fans everywhere!  Pick from four different fighters, each with their own moves and style to help you pummel your opponents into the ground until you earn your place in the pantheon of Wrestling Legends! Keep your eye on the enemy, though! Dodging their manoeuvres is essential to surviving the the match!
game.instructions:
Move around the ring - Arrow keys
Punch - A key
Kick - S
Heavy punch - A and S keys together
Drop kick - D + left or right arrow keys
Choke - D + up arrow key
Body slam - D + down arrow key
Special move - W and S keys together
Head stomp - S key while enemy is on the ground
Raise enemy - W key while enemy is on the ground
Slam enemy into the ropes - Down and S keys together

game.title: Javelin
game.controls: Click the space bar to select your power, angle and run up speed to throw the javelin as far as you can.
game.description: Javelin is the adrenaline pumping sports game placing you in the role of an esteemed Javelin thrower in the FOG Olympics Decathlon event. You get 5 rounds of 3 throws to try and beat your opponent. Its not easy to master the art of the javelin so you might need a few goes to get a high score. A tip is to make sure you click in the green areas of the power bars.
game.instructions: Click the space bar to select your power, angle and run up speed to throw the javelin as far as you can.

game.title: Carrot Fantasy
game.controls: Use the mouse cursor to position and place your defenses.
game.description: Carrot Fantasy is an insanely funny tower defence game, containing an amazing twenty-four levels plus extra bonus levels!  Protect your carrots by any means possible - even if you have to create a wall of poop towers! Shoot the clouds to give you more space to place your weapons. Sometimes clearing an area will also give you a free weapon to use to defend your carrot. You can always use your FOG coins to buy or upgrade your weapons if you get stuck. Upgrading your weapons will increase both the strength of the weapon, but also its range. With two different modes of play, Carrot fantasy is sure to keep you engrossed for hours!
game.instructions: Use the mouse cursor to position and place your defenses.

game.title: Jewel Dive
game.controls: In this game you have to make matches with jewels by using your mouse to click and drag. You can make matches horizontally or vertically. You can only move jewels to match, or they'll return to their original position. Every time that you make a match there will be new jewels appearing above. When you make a match with fallen jewels you will get even more points. You can earn power gems by matching 4 or more gems which provide you with unique effects.
game.description: Jewel Dive is a gorgeous deep-sea puzzle game!  Make matches of 3 jewels or more and boost your score to the max! Discover the powerful gems that let you clear lines and areas of jewels at once, and multiply your score with Jewel Multipliers! Don't forget to check out its mobile version, with even more features!
game.instructions: In this game you have to make matches with jewels by using your mouse to click and drag. You can make matches horizontally or vertically. You can only move jewels to match, or they'll return to their original position. Every time that you make a match there will be new jewels appearing above. When you make a match with fallen jewels you will get even more points. You can earn power gems by matching 4 or more gems which provide you with unique effects.

game.title: Valet Parking 3
game.controls:
Up arrow key - Accelerate
Down arrow key - Reverse
Left/right arrow keys - turn left/right
game.description: Valet Parking 3 is a Car Parking Game. You must run to the cars as they are dropped off by their owners. Take note of the number of the bay they must be parked at. Press the space-bar button to get and park it as quickly as possible without crashing. Then when the owners come back, you must take their cars back to them. You earn money for dropping cars off, but lose money for damage and customers who are left waiting for too long.
game.instructions:
Up arrow key - Accelerate
Down arrow key - Reverse
Left/right arrow keys - turn left/right

game.title: Monster Trucker 3D
game.controls:
Up arrow key: Accelerate
Down arrow key: Slow down/reverse
Left/right arrow keys: Turn left/right.
game.description: Nothing puts on a show like a stampede of Monster Trucks tearing up the terrain!  Bash your opponents into submission as you race towards the finishing line, flattening cars, flying over insane ramps, and navigating rough tracks!  It's every man for himself, so watch your back if you want any chance of coming out on top!
game.instructions:
Up arrow key: Accelerate
Down arrow key: Slow down/reverse
Left/right arrow keys: Turn left/right.

game.title: Alien Assault
game.controls: Use the mouse to aim and shoot.
game.description: Alien Assault is a Fast Paced Defense Game. Hundreds of alien creatures are trying to blow up your base. Luckily you have soldiers as well as your own weapon to help you defend the building. At the start of each wave of attacks you will be shown where the invasion is coming from, so use those few seconds to rearrange your troops and give them orders, you can do this by holding the left mouse key down over the character. Watch your ammo level, once it’s gone, you will have to look for pickups.
game.instructions: Use the mouse to aim and shoot.

game.title: New York Taxi License 3D
game.controls: Use the arrow keys to drive around.
game.description: New York Taxi License 3D is Driving Game. You must complete various driving based tasks to earn your New York Taxi License. There are 18 levels and some of them are on icy roads. You must avoid traffic violations like going through red lights or hitting the curbs. There are features like taking tourists around sight seeing and driving backward on an obstacle filled road.
game.instructions: Use the arrow keys to drive around.

game.title: Drifters
game.controls: Use the arrow keys to drive.
game.description: Drifters is a Car Drifting and Racing Game. Where it's not just about your ability to race but how well you can drift the corners and keep control of the car. There are 5 action packed 3D levels. Take on other racers competing for the same cup and the same glory, but remember only one of you can take it. So leave them in the dust and prove you really are the best out there.
game.instructions: Use the arrow keys to drive.

game.title: Pick Up Truck Racing
game.controls:
Accelerate - Up arrow key
Decelerate - Down arrow key
Turn left/right - Left/right arrow keys
game.description: Pick Up Truck Racing pits you against nine other racers over twelve different courses! Twist, weave, nudge and shove your way to the front of the track, scraping through really tight corners along the way! Use your winnings to upgrade your car, giving you the edge to leave your opponents in the dust.
game.instructions:
Accelerate - Up arrow key
Decelerate - Down arrow key
Turn left/right - Left/right arrow keys

game.title: Dr Lee UAssault
game.controls:
Use the W,A,S,D keys to move around.
To shoot, aim and click using the mouse button.
To reload your weapon, press R.
Press G to switch through command options.
Press F to switch through AI options.
Space commands your troops to perform the current command within the player's radius.
Press E to trigger your super move.
game.description: Dr Lee UAssault is an action packed Attacking and Defence Game. You are in control of Dr Lee and a whole army to help you blast away the enemy  base, whilst  defending your own base from them. Upgrade to get better weapons and spawn different types of team members to help you. You can also make Dr Lee more powerful by upgrading his own personal weapons. You can also give orders to your men to be in attack or defense mode.
game.instructions:
Use the W,A,S,D keys to move around.
To shoot, aim and click using the mouse button.
To reload your weapon, press R.
Press G to switch through command options.
Press F to switch through AI options.
Space commands your troops to perform the current command within the player's radius.
Press E to trigger your super move.

game.title: Eat My Axe
game.controls: Use the mouse to aim and left click to throw the axe.
game.description: In Eat My Axe you must help the love-struck axeman rescue the princess from the evil mob, the only way to free her is by using your axe throwing skills to kill the monsters. Throw with the utmost of care and accuracy though as you really don't want to hit the princess! Aim straight, bounce off walls and destroy objects such as walls and TNT as you enjoy this fantastic physics game.
game.instructions: Use the mouse to aim and left click to throw the axe.

game.title: Sky Knight 2
game.controls:
To move: W,A,S,D keys or mouse (two-player).
To fire: M or Left Mouse Button
Use bomb: N or Enter key.
Pause game/shop: Spacebar
game.description: In Sky Knight 2, it's make or break as you take on the menacing sky battalion, armed only with your plane, your guns, and if you're lucky... a friend.  Be a one-man air army, or team up with a fellow sky knight to defeat the unrelenting enemy force.  Either way, you'll be outnumbered, so stay sharp!
game.instructions:
To move: W,A,S,D keys or mouse (two-player).
To fire: M or Left Mouse Button
Use bomb: N or Enter key.
Pause game/shop: Spacebar

game.title: Kick Out Kim
game.controls: Use the mouse to launch Kim, once he is moving, you can also start throwing grenades, shooting and using lots of different boosters against him, all controlled with the mouse.
game.description: Are you sick of Kim? Time to kick him out of Pyongyang! Launch him into the air and send his rockets towards him to help defeat the dictator, call in help from the Western Super Powers as well as deadly assassins. Earn coins to buy upgrades to help defeat him... SAVE THE WORLD AND FREE NORTH KOREA... Kick Out Kim!
game.instructions: Use the mouse to launch Kim, once he is moving, you can also start throwing grenades, shooting and using lots of different boosters against him, all controlled with the mouse.

game.title: Nuke Defense
game.controls: Use WASD to move, 123 to select your weapon and your mouse to place your attacks and shoot the monster invaders. F opens your skills options.
game.description: Nuke Defence is a Tower Defence type of Game. Use different skills to kill the oncoming monsters. When they are destroyed you can collect the gold they drop and improve your three primary skills or learn brand new ones from one of the four major areas. Be it passive, fire, cold or earth. You can only have three of the non-passive abilities in use at any one time if those abilities are not enough, buy artefacts which will aid you in battle from dwarven boots to an arcane tome plus many more.
game.instructions: Use WASD to move, 123 to select your weapon and your mouse to place your attacks and shoot the monster invaders. F opens your skills options.

game.title: Police Interceptor
game.controls: Use the arrow keys to drive. Spacebar to hand break and Ctrl to use the siren.
game.description: Police Interceptor a driving game that puts you behind the wheel of a cop car. Complete all of the tasks you are set from driving at speed and not hitting anyone, or anything, to preforming the pit manoeuvre and driving on different surfaces such as water and ice. You can go really fast, and do hand-brake turns whilst blasting your siren to alert people you are coming.
game.instructions: Use the arrow keys to drive. Spacebar to hand break and Ctrl to use the siren.

game.title: Field Forces
game.controls:
W,S,A,D to move
Mouse to aim
Left click to shoot.
game.description: In Field Forces, training steps up several gears as you traverse the course and take on your training instructors. Use your ammo wisely and prove to the army that you're the best of the best! SIR... Do you have what it takes to become the ultimate trooper!? Are you the ultimate force? Stay sharp and shoot to kill!
game.instructions:
W,S,A,D to move
Mouse to aim
Left click to shoot.

game.title: The Flood: Inception Part 2
game.controls: Place objects - Left Mouse Button
game.description: The Flood: Inception Part Two is a puzzle game.  The aim of the game is to stop your character from coming into contact with the lava by solving various physics puzzles.  Tie things together, cut ropes, blow up bombs and press switches to save your character!  Collect jewels on the way to increase your score!  A hint from us is to take your time and experiment.
game.instructions: Place objects - Left Mouse Button

game.title: Infection Wars
game.controls: Use the mouse to drag units from one building to another.
game.description: Infections Wars is a strategy game where it is your job to fight an infection in a human body. The first battle takes place in the nose. Your main base is a tall white and blue tower. All towers produces units for you slowy over time. The number of units is displayed above each building. To get more units you need to claim more towers and make them your own. An un-claimed tower only needs one unit to be claimed by you but to claim the enemies tower you need to send more units into it than it already has. To win a level you have to take over all the bases of the enemy. You have special abilities you can use to help you win and these abilities can be upgraded at the end of each level.
game.instructions: Use the mouse to drag units from one building to another.

game.title: Dr Lee
game.controls: Use A and D to change direct, E to use rocket fuel.
game.description: Dr Lee is a Flying Game where Dr Lee is sitting on a rocket and you must launch him into the sky. From there the aim is to make the rocket travel as far as possible. You can collect fuel cans to increase your fuel or collect the coins floating around in the sky so you can upgrade various aspects of the rocket at the begining of your next flight. The more upgrades you get the easier flying will become, you can purchase these upgrades with FOG coins if you choose, or use the money that you earn during the game.
game.instructions: Use A and D to change direct, E to use rocket fuel.

game.title: Forklift License
game.controls: Arrow keys
game.description: In Forklift License, it's time to learn how to drive a forklift truck! Work your way through each level to get your Forklift License. Pick up crates and deliver them to the truck! Use S and W to operate the fork, and use the directional pad to move around! Do you have what it takes? Good luck and drive well!
game.instructions: Arrow keys

game.title: Turret Head
game.controls: Use your mouse to aim your four guns. To select a gun press 1, 2, 3 or 4 on your keypad. Make sure you use the correct gun for the oncoming enemy.
game.description: Your army has landed and must advance to capture the land. You are the first line of defence and attack! You must shoot and kill everything in front of you to ensure victory. You have been equipped with four guns, including an anti-aircraft gun to ensure you can shoot down all that attacks. Good Luck soldier!
game.instructions: Use your mouse to aim your four guns. To select a gun press 1, 2, 3 or 4 on your keypad. Make sure you use the correct gun for the oncoming enemy.

game.title: Go Kart 3D
game.controls: Use the arrow keys to drive.
game.description: Get racing in Go Kart 3D. Take on 3 other racers across 4 tracks as you race for the Go Karts 3D championship. Each level will get harder so keep your wits about you when taking corners and straights. Watch out for the other racers, as they seem to think this is a contact sport. Do you have what it takes? Drivers, to your vehicles!
game.instructions: Use the arrow keys to drive.

game.title: FOG Free Kicks
game.controls: Use the mouse to click the options.
game.description: Are you ready for FOG Free Kicks? The aim of this game is to hit the ball into the net through a series of challenges. Get the ball past all the players, facing the goal from different real life angles. Get the curve, power and direction just right. Practice makes perfect in this football game, so what are you waiting for? Show your free kick skills today with FOG free kicks!
game.instructions: Use the mouse to click the options.

game.title: School Bus License 3
game.controls: Use the arrow keys to drive around and spacebar for handbrake.
game.description: School Bus License 3 is a American Scool Bus Driving Simulator Game. There are 17 levels, they range from picking children up from a variety of bus stops and dropping them at school. Avoiding road blocks and make sure the ride is smooth enough so the kids are not sick on the bus. The faster you complete each task the better your score will be, so it's worth going back to replay a level and improve your score.
game.instructions: Use the arrow keys to drive around and spacebar for handbrake.

game.title: Urban Sniper 4
game.controls: Use the mouse to pickup the gun. Spacebar to aim and left click shoots.
game.description: This is the 4th episode of Urban Sniper, the Shooting Stickman Game. Click on the gun to raise it and hit the spacebar to look through the telescopic sight. You are hired to take out certain targets. Which can be anything from taking down corrupt cops to taking out cats in a junk yard. Try and complete all the levels because there is a twist in the story near the end.
game.instructions: Use the mouse to pickup the gun. Spacebar to aim and left click shoots.

game.title: Dogfight SIM
game.controls:
1) Options are to use the MOUSE to fly + LEFT CLICK click to open fire.
2) Or use the Keyboard ARROW KEYS + CTRL to shoot.

SPACE TO BOOST
game.description: In Dogfight SIM, its the second World War and you're a lone pilot in the skies. Are you the best there is, born to fight, shoot and kill? Maneuver your plane to avoid enemy fire and mid-air collisions. This is a very fast-paced super War Time Flight Simulator game. Do you have what it takes to rule the skies? Pilots, to your planes!
game.instructions:
1) Options are to use the MOUSE to fly + LEFT CLICK click to open fire.
2) Or use the Keyboard ARROW KEYS + CTRL to shoot.

SPACE TO BOOST

game.title: Valet Parking 2
game.controls: Arrow keys to move and drive, spacebar to get in and out of cars.
game.description: Valet Parking 2 is a Car Parking Game. You must collect the cars as they are dropped off by their owners and take note of the number of the bay they must be parked at. Use the spacebar to get in and out of the car and park it as quickly as possible without crashing. Then when the owners come back, you must take their respective cars back to them. You earn money for dropping cars off, but lose money for damage and customers who have been waiting too long.
game.instructions: Arrow keys to move and drive, spacebar to get in and out of cars.

game.title: Tiny Racers
game.controls: Use your arrow keys to control your Tiny F1 car.
game.description: Enter the world of Tiny F1 on FOG.com. Race tiny racing cars around various tracks and finish first to unlock the next race. The higher you finish, the more money you earn to help pay for upgrades to improve your car for the next round!! Do you have what it takes? Can you become the FOG Tiny F1 champion? Race to win!
game.instructions: Use your arrow keys to control your Tiny F1 car.

game.title: Parkour
game.controls: Run with the arrow keys, spacebar to jump and S to spray.
game.description: Parkour is a Free-Running Game with graffiti added in. Escape from the police as you leap over vehicles, rooftops and other obstacles and collect aerosol cans of paint. The more jumps you do, the more sprays you get and the longer you go can avoid being caught, the more your score will build. Don't worry about falling too far as you will not be hurt.
game.instructions: Run with the arrow keys, spacebar to jump and S to spray.

game.title: Heli Support
game.controls: A and S to drop magnets, Q and W to take them back up and mouse to fly.
game.description: Heli Support is a physics based helicopter game. You must airlift objects and place them carefully to build a path for the tanks, or any other army vehicles. There are 12 levels, all with increasing difficulty. Keep an eye on your fuel meter too, as if you run out of fuel, your helicopter will crash and you’ll fail the level. You can refuel by flying back to your base and landing gently. The controls for the ropes are a bit hard to master at first, but after some practice you'll soon become a pro at using them.
game.instructions: A and S to drop magnets, Q and W to take them back up and mouse to fly.

game.title: Line Racer
game.controls: Use the mouse to draw a line, the car will then follow.
game.description: Line Racer is a new kind of Racing Game in which you must draw the route that the yellow car will take. Paint the line of the route that you want your car to follow with the mouse. Moving fast to gain speed. You will then start the lap racing against the blue car, cross the line before the other car to win. After each level, you will earn FOG coins which can then be spent on upgrades for your car. Make sure you watch out for the nitrus charging and use it to give your car a quick boost.
game.instructions: Use the mouse to draw a line, the car will then follow.

game.title: Ocean Drift Racing
game.controls:
Accelerate - Up Arrow Key
Decelerate - Down Arrow Key
Turn left/right - Left/Right Arrow Keys
game.description: Ocean Drift Racing challenges you to the ultimate aquatic race! Pit your wits against other motorboat racers, dodging a variety of dangerous obstacles along the way.  Weave your way past rocks, bridges and spectators as you glide the seas on your way to the finishing line.  Be careful, the other racers are in it for keeps, and they'll nudge and bash you out of their way to reach their goal!
game.instructions:
Accelerate - Up Arrow Key
Decelerate - Down Arrow Key
Turn left/right - Left/Right Arrow Keys

game.title: The Empires 2
game.controls: Use the mouse in game.
game.description: In The Empires 2, your kingdom is under attack once again by a mighty foe, so it is down to you to build up your empire and defend your citizens from certain doom, death and destruction! Do you have what it takes to be the leader your citizens need in a time of crisis? Are you the leader your empire needs???
game.instructions: Use the mouse in game.

game.title: Baseball Big Hitter
game.controls: Use the mouse to aim and hit the ball.
game.description: Baseball Big Hitter is a game based on timing and quick reactions, you get 24 balls pitched at you and you must aim to hit the ball as far as you can to get the best score possible. Where you strike the ball is important as it will determine whether it will go high or low, left or right. If you miss the ball you lose that shot. Each swing will add up for your total score. Oh, and watch out for bonus stars.
game.instructions: Use the mouse to aim and hit the ball.

game.title: No Halo No Entry
game.controls: Use the the mouse to aim, shoot and control power.
game.description: No Halo No Entry is an Archery based Puzzle Game. Your mission is to kill all the demons on each level and free the trapped Angels. This game has 24 levels, shoot targets directly, bounce your arrows off objects, or hit items to create a reaction that will end in the bad guys destruction. Rolling balls with spikes and many other interactive objects will appear on different levels.
game.instructions: Use the the mouse to aim, shoot and control power.

game.title: Assembots
game.controls: Use your mouse to instruct each robot of their job. Be sure to use pause if you need a little more time to assess and plan your route to safety. You can also scroll through the challenge by moving your mouse to the sides of the screen.
game.description: Assembots is a Strategy Game. You must guide your robot team from the factory safely to their destination. Assign different taks to the robots at the correct moment. There are 11 tasks such as breaking through walls and floors to blasting through rock, building bridges, and swimming. Use the pause button to think ahead and plan your strategy.
game.instructions: Use your mouse to instruct each robot of their job. Be sure to use pause if you need a little more time to assess and plan your route to safety. You can also scroll through the challenge by moving your mouse to the sides of the screen.

game.title: Goodgame Gangster
game.controls: Use the mouse to control the action in game.
game.description: Goodgame Gangster is a simulation game in which you play a gangster. Complete missions for the godfather to gain rewards and improve your character, then duel with other real players and buy new items from the black market, in time you will be able to build up your own family and make it the most powerful in the city,
game.instructions: Use the mouse to control the action in game.

game.title: Goodgame Empire
game.controls: Use your mouse to control your empire
game.description: Goodgame Empire is a great strategy MMO by Good-game Studios. Build your own castle, create a powerful army and fight epic player versus player battles on a dynamic world map. Crush your enemies, conquer land and rise to be the ruler of a mighty empire! Do you have what it takes to take over the world? Are you a leader who can build a great empire?
game.instructions: Use your mouse to control your empire

game.title: Urban Sniper 3
game.controls:
Use your mouse to aim
Spacebar to Zoom
Left click to shoot.
game.description: You're shooting skills are back in Urban Sniper 3! After a long time out of the game, you're back and now you grab your sniper rifle in order to generate some much needed cash!! Take out the targets and earn those big bucks!! Do you still have what it takes to become a world class assassin? Can you clean up the city or will you fail?
game.instructions:
Use your mouse to aim
Spacebar to Zoom
Left click to shoot.

game.title: Baseball Challenge
game.controls:
Use the mouse to aim.
Left click to swing.
game.description: In Baseball Challenge, you've got some awesome challenges ahead of you if you want to complete your super cool Baseball career in style!! Hit home-runs, aim for specific sections of the baseball field and even take aim at the pitcher!  Complete all of the challenges and submit your high score. Do you have what it takes to top the leader-board? If not the first time, keep trying as practice makes perfect.
game.instructions:
Use the mouse to aim.
Left click to swing.

game.title: Plunder Squad
game.controls:
Movement - W,A,S,D keys.
Aim and fire: Use the mouse cursor to aim, left click to fire.
Switch weapons: Number keys 1-6.
game.description: Plunder Squad is a top down shooting game. The game has 5 floors, with each floor having many battle rooms. Lead your Plunder Squad into the temple, pillaging whatever precious items you can while taking on the temple's defences!  Watch out though, the temple is quite the tricky maze, with foes of all kinds filling its many treasure-filled dungeons. If you keep your weapons upgraded, and make good use of the checkpoints however, you might just get by - but it won't be easy!
game.instructions:
Movement - W,A,S,D keys.
Aim and fire: Use the mouse cursor to aim, left click to fire.
Switch weapons: Number keys 1-6.

game.title: Build Up
game.controls: Use the mouse to click and drag beams across  connectors.
game.description: Build up is a Physics Game with 16 levels, in which you must create a stable structure that can withstand a heavy weight. Draw lines between the small circles and squares, but use as few pieces as you can, to lower the expense and increase your score, if you go over budget it will effect your star rating, Use the hammer to erase any mistakes you have made.
game.instructions: Use the mouse to click and drag beams across  connectors.

game.title: Moto Mayhem
game.controls: Use arrow keys or A and D to move.
game.description: Jump onto your bike in Moto Mayhem, race against other wacky players as the King. Compete in a series of races. Unlock new bikes as you go. Why not see if you can fit in some flips and tricks as you collect boosters and compete for the no1 spot.
game.instructions: Use arrow keys or A and D to move.

game.title: Touch the Sky
game.controls: Use the arrow keys to steer the flying machine and spacebar for boost.
game.description: Touch the Sky a Flying Game. The basic aim is to fly as far as you can. You start with a basic glider and earn money the more you fly. Use these funds to upgrade your flying machine allowing you to get all the way across the junk yard. Use the arrow keys to control your craft and space bar will give you a boost once you are airborne.  Remember to watch out for the junk yard dogs, they bite! This game allows you to use FOG Coins to upgrade your craft so you can touch the sky in record time!
game.instructions: Use the arrow keys to steer the flying machine and spacebar for boost.

game.title: Stunt Rider
game.controls: Hold the left mouse button down to ride downhill, release to launch at the top of the hill.
game.description: In Stunt Rider, you play a retired motorbike stunt rider, and a new upstart who thinks he's better than you has come along to challenge you!! Grab your gear and prove that you're still the best stunt rider of all time. Send him packing to his mama's! All you have to do is click and hold the mouse at the correct time to perfect your jumps and beat the other motorcycle rider. If your opponent gets too far ahead of you it's game over.
game.instructions: Hold the left mouse button down to ride downhill, release to launch at the top of the hill.

game.title: New York Taxi License
game.controls: Arrow keys to drive
game.description: New York Taxi License is a driving game where you learn to drive a taxi in New York! Follow the instructor and drive safe in order to get your ticket to a new job.  This game has a scoreboard, so the quicker you are the higher up the scoreboard you'll be. But by careful as rushing can cause a crash and you'd fail.Great practice for those actually about to do their tests!
game.instructions: Arrow keys to drive

game.title: Siege Of Troy
game.controls:
Use the mouse to aim
Hold left mouse to draw back your arrow and release to fire.
game.description: In Siege of Troy, the legendary city of Troy is under siege and you are the only one who can protect it! Take up arms and defend Troy with your life. Increasing numbers of enemies will try and bash down the city walls, and it's up to you to take them out in this awesome point and click game! Increasingly superior weapons and armour can be also be bought with Fog coins.  Beware of strangers bearing gifts.
game.instructions:
Use the mouse to aim
Hold left mouse to draw back your arrow and release to fire.

game.title: Port Valet
game.controls: Use the arrow keys to drive the boats
game.description: Port Valet is the name, parking boats is the game.  Your job is to carefully manoeuver the boats into the correct bay as requested by the customer.  Forward, reverse, straighten her up, but take it easy as any bump will result in your wages being "docked" (pardon the pun). Too much damage will result in game over.  There are plenty of levels to play through in this addictive driving game.
game.instructions: Use the arrow keys to drive the boats

game.title: Spartacus
game.controls:
Arrow keys or WSAD to move - Double tap left or right arrow OR A or D to run
Light Attack - Z or J
Heavy Attack - X or K
Guard - C or L
Pick up weapon - C or L
Spectator Rush - Spacebar
game.description: In Spartacus, you play as Spartacus, and as the legend says, your goal as a true warrior to fight for freedom! Break out of the gladiator arena and into the streets of Rome to fight the mighty Empire! Fight through eight challenging levels, against unique boss enemies, then go and destroy your enemies with style in the cinematic mode.
game.instructions:
Arrow keys or WSAD to move - Double tap left or right arrow OR A or D to run
Light Attack - Z or J
Heavy Attack - X or K
Guard - C or L
Pick up weapon - C or L
Spectator Rush - Spacebar

game.title: Spunky vs Aliens
game.controls: Use the mouse
game.description: In Spunky Vs Aliens, the aliens are invading your neighborhood and it's down to you, Spunky the Dog, to take the fight to the aliens and stop the invasion!! They've destroyed your masters' house, and now you're really, really mad! Remember you have unlimited ammo so don't let those aliens defeat you!
game.instructions: Use the mouse

game.title: War Elephant
game.controls:
Move elephants - Use arrow keys, or click directional arrow buttons.
Summon squads - Press viking/archer buttons.
Fire arrows - Press the various arrow buttons on the left
Charge elephant - Press elephant button
game.description: In War Elephant, your goal is to face hordes of the world's most vicious warriors as you lead your army to glory in your quest for the legendary axe! Upgrade your units! Call for reinforcements during battle! Buy as many as it takes to win this awesome game and remember as long as your warrior elephant survives, you can win! Make it to the enemy castle to beat the level and continue conquering the map!
game.instructions:
Move elephants - Use arrow keys, or click directional arrow buttons.
Summon squads - Press viking/archer buttons.
Fire arrows - Press the various arrow buttons on the left
Charge elephant - Press elephant button

game.title: 4x4 Soccer
game.controls:
Up arrow key - Accelerate
Down arrow key - Decelerate/reverse
Left/right arrow keys - turn left/right
game.description: In 4x4 Soccer, you have to ask yourself: What's more exciting than soccer?  4x4 soccer!  Pit your skills against the world's greatest in this clever twist on the classic sports game, and drive your way to victory! Select your national team, and follow the championship chart all the way to the very top!
game.instructions:
Up arrow key - Accelerate
Down arrow key - Decelerate/reverse
Left/right arrow keys - turn left/right

game.title: Penguins Super Kart
game.controls:
Arrow keys to drive
Spacebar to use your special
game.description: In Penguins Super Kart, your goal is to race around awesome tracks! The Penguins have taken a break from all out war to compete against each other in the all new formula one penguin championships. Take control of an awesome vehicle, compete against other amazing drivers, win and take home the gold! Drivers, start your engines!
game.instructions:
Arrow keys to drive
Spacebar to use your special

game.title: Mini Parking 3D
game.controls: Arrow keys to drive.
game.description: In Mini Parking 3D, it is time to test your driving skills in this quirky parking game. Drive the various vehicles to the flashing parking bay and park them without crashing! Choose from different cool levels, avoid the traffic, and get it right! Great practice and help for learner drivers out there!
game.instructions: Arrow keys to drive.

game.title: Overheat
game.controls: Movement - Left and right arrow keys to move, up or spacebar to jump.
game.description: Goodness, gracious, great balls of fire! In Overheat, your goal is to navigate your way through 25 challenging stages designed to push your timing and reflexes to their limit as you guide the flame to its furnace before it withers away! Use your directional pad to control the flame, avoid spikes and other obstacles, climb walls by hitting jump multiple times and get to those flames in record time!
game.instructions: Movement - Left and right arrow keys to move, up or spacebar to jump.

game.title: Fairytale Annihilation
game.controls:
WSAD to move
Mouse to aim and shoot.
game.description: Fairytale Annihilation is a cartoon shooting game where you must repair your helicopter that has crashed landed. Enemies like fairies, unicorns, haunted lollipops and other hideous fantasy creatures come your waycome from each side of the screen while you start in the middle. As the game goes on you earn money in order to buy new weapons and hire friends that help you shoot the enemies while you try to get your helicopter working again, in order to escape Fairytale Island.  This game also uses FOG coins to help you level the playing field with upgrades.
game.instructions:
WSAD to move
Mouse to aim and shoot.

game.title: Cube Tank Arena
game.controls:
Movement - Arrow keys
Aim - Use the mouse to aim, left click to shoot
game.description: Cube Tank Arena is a 3D Tank shooting game where you must fight and destroy waves of other tanks in order to get to the next level. At the end of each level is a super powerful boss that you must fight also. Once an enemy tank is destroyed it might drop poer-ups you can use within the game or coins that you can collect and use to buy upgrades for your tank. There are 5 arenas in total to fight in.
game.instructions:
Movement - Arrow keys
Aim - Use the mouse to aim, left click to shoot

game.title: Mini Metro Racers
game.controls:
Arrow keys to drive
P to pause
game.description: Do you remember when you were playing with toy cars out in the yard, all that fun you had as a kid? Well it's time to relive those memories with our Mini Metro Racers! Drive miniature cars around wacky tracks using the directional controls and come in first! Seriously nostalgic and addictive, transport yourself back to the past now and start playing!
game.instructions:
Arrow keys to drive
P to pause

game.title: Phantom Slash
game.controls:
Hold left mouse and move to slice.
Spacebar to activate pistol then left click to shoot.
game.description: Hello You Landlovers, there's some trouble on the top deck. Pirate ghosts are running amok the old shipwreck ruins, slice and shoot them back to their graves. In Phantom Slash, it is all about the speed! Click and drag to slice, and simply point and click to shoot! How many can you take down before it is game over?
game.instructions:
Hold left mouse and move to slice.
Spacebar to activate pistol then left click to shoot.

game.title: Traffic Mania
game.controls:
Click the icons to move the traffic in a direction, click again to halt traffic.
Click the helicopter to pickup broken down vehicles.
game.description: The traffic in this city is getting uncontrollable, so we need your help! Guide the traffic coming from different directions on this chaotic intersection in this action-based puzzle game. Use the helicopter for assistance to clean up the streets after an unfortunate break-down. Don't let the cars sit for too long -- they want to get home!
game.instructions:
Click the icons to move the traffic in a direction, click again to halt traffic.
Click the helicopter to pickup broken down vehicles.

game.title: sqirlz
game.controls: Use the mouse to remove the blocks.
game.description: Gravity can be your best friend or your worst enemy! In this innovative new physics-puzzle game, you'll have to help Sqirlz -- our squishy hero -- reach his jelly platform at the base of every structure by clicking on the red blocks that stand in the way you will eliminate them and give Sqirlz a route to the bottom. Using your wits, speed, and the power of gravity, solve each of these creative new puzzles to advance to the next stage!
game.instructions: Use the mouse to remove the blocks.

game.title: Robot Cake Defender
game.controls: Use your mouse to shoot the robots and defend the cake. Make sure you shoot the power ups to help you fight off those cake eating mechanical monsters and save the day.
game.description: Robot Cake Defender is a fast paced Shooting and Defending game. Hundreds of robots are jumping down the platforms and trying to steal your cake. Shoot as many as you can. Pick up barriers that block them for a short while, mines that blow the robots up if they are close and tiles that double the size of the robots, so they are easier to hit.
game.instructions: Use your mouse to shoot the robots and defend the cake. Make sure you shoot the power ups to help you fight off those cake eating mechanical monsters and save the day.

game.title: Counter Terror
game.controls:
Cursor keys for movement.
Z = Jump
X = Shoot
C = Deploy special item
S = Switch special item

Player 2 - See in game controls.
game.description: Sneaking through the city's various facilities and taking out terrorists with stealth and skill is what your job is all about. Play alone or with a friend in cooperative mode to clear the terrorists. Use all kinds of cool utilities that come standard for this kind of special-forces work. This arcade-style action-scroller comes packed with interactive environments and tons of tactics to clear each stage.
game.instructions:
Cursor keys for movement.
Z = Jump
X = Shoot
C = Deploy special item
S = Switch special item

Player 2 - See in game controls.

game.title: Om Nom Zombies
game.controls: Use the mouse to aim and shoot
game.description: In this unique new arcade-style zombie shooter, you'll have to defend the beautiful, helpless woman from the oncoming zombies who are looking for a midnight snack. You'll only be able to see a small area thanks to your flashlight, but watch the battery life! Your sight will become more limited as the batteries die. Grab more batteries, ammo, and even cool weapons like a bomb you can strap onto zombies!
game.instructions: Use the mouse to aim and shoot

game.title: Detective Conrad
game.controls: Use arrow keys to move, some in game controls will be visible too.
game.description: Detective Conrad is on the case! In this beautifully dark arcade-style side-scrolling platformer, you'll guide Detective Conrad through a series of dark puzzles in a haunted castle. Avoid the dangers, grab the keys, solve the puzzles, and get out alive! Thanks to your brilliant wit and Conrad's amazing jumping skills, this case should be solved in no time!
game.instructions: Use arrow keys to move, some in game controls will be visible too.

game.title: Lawnmower Racing 3D
game.controls:
Arrow keys to drive
P to pause
game.description: Lawn mowers are great for everything -- from mowing lawns to racing! In this unique new 3D racing game, you'll get behind the wheel of a lawn mower and compete for first place! Advance through the stages for a variety of different raceways from Nashville to Springfield. Enjoy the scenery and smell of fresh-cut grass!
game.instructions:
Arrow keys to drive
P to pause

game.title: Super Sprint Soccer
game.controls: Use the mouse to control the player, pull away from the player to increase force.
game.description: In this table-top soccer match with a new twist, you'll have to use your team of players to complete your goals on a variety of challenging puzzle matches. Click and drag to fling your players toward the soccer ball to pass or shoot. Place your teammates strategically to set up the shot. Don't let your players fly into the opponents or you'll get a foul!
game.instructions: Use the mouse to control the player, pull away from the player to increase force.

game.title: Toms Beach Parking Lot
game.controls:
Arrow keys to drive
Space bar to finish parking.
game.description: Impressing the ladies with his new convertible will be difficult if he can't even park! In this challenging action-puzzle, you'll help Tom park his car -- a pretty simple task, if it wasn't for all the crazy drivers, absurd obstacles, and relentless puzzles getting in his way. You can get a few scratches on your new car, but watch your health!
game.instructions:
Arrow keys to drive
Space bar to finish parking.

game.title: Cruel Balls
game.controls: Use the mouse to aim and shoot.
game.description: It's time to take aim against those castle-dwelling boxes! Aiming your cannon toward the distant and well-guarded enemies, practice your precision and skill as you do your best to blow up the defenses. Try out a huge variety of different weapons as you pass each challenge. Similar to Angry Birds, you'll have to use your wits, skills, and explosives.
game.instructions: Use the mouse to aim and shoot.

game.title: Canyon Valley Rally
game.controls:
Arrow keys to drive
P to Pause
Escape to quit to main menu
game.description: Jeeps are designed for off-road challenges like this one, but that doesn't mean it'll be easy! Just staying upright will be tough in this intense desert race. Keep your balance, hug the turns, and knock into your opponents to flip them over and give yourself an edge. Incredible 3D graphics make this game easy to look at, but not easy to beat!
game.instructions:
Arrow keys to drive
P to Pause
Escape to quit to main menu

game.title: Sea Food And Shoot It
game.controls: Aim and shoot - Use the mouse
game.description: The ocean is filled with grotesque sea creatures, and now you can finally clean it up! In this action-shooter, you'll take out the various sea creatures, from basic fish to stingrays and even octopuses. Getting a hit off one of the more elusive and rare creatures will give you additional bullets and time!
game.instructions: Aim and shoot - Use the mouse

game.title: Superbike Extreme
game.controls:
Accelerate - Up arrow key
Decelerate - Down arrow key
Turn left/right - Left/right arrow keys
game.description: Superbike Extreme is the ultimate superbike racing game! Pit your skills against five other players, across five increasingly challenging tracks as you race your way to the finishing line!  Beware of the other racers, they're willing to shove and nudge you off the track, so keep your distance, and don't forget to keep to the track!
game.instructions:
Accelerate - Up arrow key
Decelerate - Down arrow key
Turn left/right - Left/right arrow keys

game.title: Shipping Yard
game.controls:
Use the mouse to move the crane arm
Hold left mouse button to activate the magnetic pad
Release left mouse to deactivate the magnetic pad
game.description: Working on the ship yard has never been easy. Your massive magnetic crane will help, but not too much. Moving the cargo from the platform onto the boat, you'll have to carefully place the cargo to the best of your ability, clicking to activate the magnetic pull and releasing to let it go. Don't throw it too far or you'll miss the target!
game.instructions:
Use the mouse to move the crane arm
Hold left mouse button to activate the magnetic pad
Release left mouse to deactivate the magnetic pad

game.title: Truck Race 3D
game.controls: Use the keyboard to control the truck.
game.description: These tractor trailers just don't know their place -- they're interested in racing, and you have to help. Drive the massive and unruly truck as you compete with various rivals. With various optional camera angles and excellent 3D graphics, you'll have a hard time staying away -- and staying on the road.
game.instructions: Use the keyboard to control the truck.

game.title: Urban Micro Racers
game.controls: Arrow keys to drive.
game.description: Racing just got a little more... micro. Using the arrow keys to navigate the beautiful retro graphics, race against others in this crisp, top-down driving game. Grab power-ups like the turbo boost, health packs, and extra petrol to help you conquer the streets. Play through a ton of levels and pick from plenty of different cars (once you've unlocked them, of course).
game.instructions: Arrow keys to drive.

game.title: Zombie Express
game.controls:
Use the mouse to click and drag the zombie crates to your truck.
A and D to drive
game.description: That dang-old zombie apocalypse is finally over! Unfortunately, we have a lot of zombies to get rid of! Stack the caged-up zombies onto your tractor trailer and take them away to the zombie zoo. Be careful not to speed too much or the zombies will fall off the back and start invading town again! Steep slopes and the unforgiving physics make this game a real challenge!
game.instructions:
Use the mouse to click and drag the zombie crates to your truck.
A and D to drive

game.title: I Am Ultra Killer Of Zombies
game.controls:
Mouse to aim and shoot
WSAD keys to move
R to reload
game.description: The name just about says it all. In this top-down action survival shooter, you've crashed in the middle of nowhere and you'll need to defend yourself against the onslaught of malicious and hungry zombies. Collect cogs to build new and more powerful weapons. Use any spare moments you have to find shelter and do some repairs
game.instructions:
Mouse to aim and shoot
WSAD keys to move
R to reload
game.developer_name: I Am Ultra Killer Of Zombies

game.title: Factory Kingdom
game.controls: Use the mouse to choose and place workers, work stations and decorations.
game.description: Factory Kingdom is a Business Simulation Game. Your goal is to start your own clothing company and make it grow to get as much money as you can. You can choose between three levels of difficulty influencing the amount of cash you start with. Buy desks and other equipments, hire workers and start earning some cash to buy more stuff. Hire more people, expand and earn even more cash! Don't forget to keep your workers happy and productive with restaurants and games. We highly reccomend you follow the in game tutorial at least once.
game.instructions: Use the mouse to choose and place workers, work stations and decorations.

game.title: Off Roaders 3D
game.controls: Arrow keys to drive
game.description: Off Roaders 3D is an intense, off-road Jeep racing game. Hugging tight turns on the slippery mud, guide your truck to the finish line! Speeding is great, but it'll take some skill to master the harsh course -- let off on the gas a bit to successfully pass the bends (and your opponents!). Compete online for the best times!
game.instructions: Arrow keys to drive
