game.title: Eggstinction
game.controls:
Arrow keys to move
Q + E to change weapons
Space to activate rage mode when the meter is full.
Mouse to aim and shoot.
game.description: It's dinosaur eggs vs aliens in this prehistoric side-scrolling action game! Controlling your egg and bringing him to safety, shoot out the alien ships with an awesome variety of weapons from pistols to boomerangs. Use your powerful rage attack to take out more baddies in your fight to survive the extinction of your dinosaur race!
game.instructions:
Arrow keys to move
Q + E to change weapons
Space to activate rage mode when the meter is full.
Mouse to aim and shoot.

game.title: Slam Drift
game.controls: The game automatically drives forward for you, use the left and right arrows to steer while down arrow slows you slightly.
game.description: There's a riot in prison -- the perfect opportunity for an escape! Too bad the prison yard is on lock-down. Speed through the yard, dodging the walls and pillars -- and most importantly, the police! Grab health and power-ups like oil to keep the fuzz off your tail. The levels are different every time for a dynamic challenge. Stay free for as long as you can!
game.instructions: The game automatically drives forward for you, use the left and right arrows to steer while down arrow slows you slightly.

game.title: Match 3 Adventure
game.controls: Use the mouse to move the blocks just like Bejeweled.
game.description: In this Anime-style puzzle game, you'll have to match up three or more blocks of the same color to clear the board and kill the baddies! Getting a higher number of color combinations allows your character to use more powerful attacks. Take a variety of new and challenging monsters in this unique new puzzle game!
game.instructions: Use the mouse to move the blocks just like Bejeweled.

game.title: Tank Combat
game.controls: Use the arrow keys to move, and space to fire.
game.description: In this top-down arcade-style game, take out the enemy tank as you battle it out in the Pong Universe! All the cannon fodder in this game will fly off the walls and ricochet into the tanks, you'll have to be careful and crafty. Face this challenge with a variety of modes and multiple different stages.
game.instructions: Use the arrow keys to move, and space to fire.

game.title: Advanced Army Training
game.controls:
Mouse to aim and shoot.
W S A D to move.
Space to throw grenade
game.description: The military testing grounds are open for business, and it's time to prove yourself! Take out targets such as hostile terrorists with your rifle, blow up bunches of rivals with your grenades, and save the hostages before it's too late! You'll have to be quick and accurate. Don't waste the military's bullets!
game.instructions:
Mouse to aim and shoot.
W S A D to move.
Space to throw grenade

game.title: Pixel Quest
game.controls:
Use WSAD or Arrow Keys to Move
L or Z to Dash
game.description: Pixel Quest is a side-scrolling action puzzle with beautiful retro graphics and a great series of challenges. Rex, the main character, is a skilled and athletic adventurer deep in the jungle. Dash under falling spikes, jump from wall to wall, and keep Rex alive as he searches for the ultimate treasure!
game.instructions:
Use WSAD or Arrow Keys to Move
L or Z to Dash

game.title: Star Journey
game.controls: Use the mouse to control your ship, left click to thrust.
game.description: Outer space is hard to navigate! Fly in between satellites and collect the stars to make your journey a safe and productive one! Head for the portal once you've gotten all the stars. Zipping through the obstacles will be tricky, though. Once you've gained momentum, it's hard to stop! Propel yourself this way and that in this physics-based space adventure!
game.instructions: Use the mouse to control your ship, left click to thrust.

game.title: Flight 3D Aerobatics Training
game.controls:
Use the arrow keys to fly however remember this is flight controls so

Down Arrow - Pull Up
Up Arrow - Push Down
game.description: Flight 3D Aerobatics Training has wonderfully realistic (and challenging) controls. Guiding your plane is not as easy as using the arrow keys to aim your direction -- you'll have to abide by professional air flight physics (down to go up, up to go down, and tilting, rather than steering the plane). It takes some getting used to, but the feeling of flying is amazing!
game.instructions:
Use the arrow keys to fly however remember this is flight controls so

Down Arrow - Pull Up
Up Arrow - Push Down

game.title: Monster Truck 3D Reloaded
game.controls: Arrow Keys to drive.
game.description: Monster trucks have never been for the weak-of-heart, and it just got a little more extreme. Drive your monster truck through an insane series of levels from hundreds of miles above the ground! Don't fall off the edges or you'll land on some unsuspecting citizens. Fly off ramps and do monster acrobatics to get to the finish line -- and that's just the first level!
game.instructions: Arrow Keys to drive.

game.title: Pick and Dig 2
game.controls: Use the arrow keys to move.
game.description: Pick and Dig is back, and there's loads more to do in this side-scrolling action puzzle, you have to pick through rock walls and dig through the earth to complete each stage. Grab ladders to climb over spaces. Every item you have can only be used once, so use your resources (and your environment) carefully! You'll really have to think ahead and use everything you can to your advantage if you want to get out of all the mazes!
game.instructions: Use the arrow keys to move.

game.title: Quad Trials
game.controls: Drive with the arrow keys and use the spacebar to jump.
game.description: Quad Trials is a driving game which includes five different levels with many difficult objects you have to overcome to complete each level driving your quad bike.  Use the arrow keys on your keyboard to ride your bike and use spacebar to jump when neccessary over the difficult objects.  Once you have complete all of the five different levels you can then submit your score and compete against other quad biking fantatics and see who has the best score.
game.instructions: Drive with the arrow keys and use the spacebar to jump.

game.title: Mole Mines
game.controls: Click on the tiles to progress on the board, hover over a tile and press a key on the keyboard if you suspect that tile to contain a mine. Clear the board without hitting a mine to win.
game.description: A fun twist on the classic PC game Minesweeper! This game has the unusual challenge of hexagonal pieces. Each number you uncover will tell you how many mine holes there are in the surrounding pieces -- but don't let the mole fall into the mine shafts! Use the shift key to mark mines and keep the mole safe! Clear the board to win!
game.instructions: Click on the tiles to progress on the board, hover over a tile and press a key on the keyboard if you suspect that tile to contain a mine. Clear the board without hitting a mine to win.

game.title: Happy Builder
game.controls: Use the mouse in-game to place your objects.
game.description: The title of "Builder of the Year" is up for grabs! Using the mouse to grab the different parts of each building, you'll have to put together increasingly complex creations in record time. Being the best isn't easy -- you'll have to place each piece with both speed and precision if you want to beat this action-based puzzle game!
game.instructions: Use the mouse in-game to place your objects.

game.title: Fun Math
game.controls: Use the mouse to click the answers.
game.description: Math is a great way to boost your overall logic and thinking skills (and one of the most lucrative degrees you can earn!). You'll be faced with a slew of fast-paced math challenges with increasing difficulty. For an added challenge, try the more difficult problems in the upper-right of the screen. You're in a race against time (and your own forgetfulness!).
game.instructions: Use the mouse to click the answers.

game.title: Rocketeer
game.controls: Use the mouse to move the penguin.
game.description: Rocketeer is a fun, frantic flying game in which you help the penguin reach the moon, bouncing on clouds to propel you into the skies, and collecting as many coins, diamonds and other collectables as you can along the way! The more coins you collect the more equipment you can upgrade to help bring this eager penguin closer to his dreams!
game.instructions: Use the mouse to move the penguin.

game.title: Zombies and Donuts
game.controls: Use the arrows to move.
game.description: In this beautiful, arcade-style action puzzle, you will have to navigate the walls of a maze, grab donuts, and avoid zombies! A few people are taken hostage by the zombies on every map, so you'll have to grab them and lead them to the safety of the green zone. Don't let the hostages get eaten alive (or yourself, for that matter) or you'll lose the game!
game.instructions: Use the arrows to move.

game.title: Port Pilot
game.controls: Use the mouse to click on a ship then drag a path to the coloured docks to unload.
game.description: Port Pilot is a new and interesting action-puzzle game with a unique twist. Each boat will enter your waters with multiple, differently colored packages. By clicking and dragging on a particular boat, you can draw out the course of action and help the boats to unload all the packages into their corresponding colored ports. This never-before-seen challenge is both fun and difficult.
game.instructions: Use the mouse to click on a ship then drag a path to the coloured docks to unload.

game.title: Material Mole 3
game.controls:
Use the arrow keys to drive.
Shift to drop treasure.
Space to toggle gates.
Z to speed up.
game.description: Ever wonder what moles do all day underground? Collect gems, of course! In this side-scrolling action-puzzle game, you have to help the moles collect gems in their underground carts. Speeding through the tight caves may make you flip over, so you'd better be careful. Using space-bar to switch the path you take, you can advance though the levels in a variety of ways! Every game in this action-puzzler is different!
game.instructions:
Use the arrow keys to drive.
Shift to drop treasure.
Space to toggle gates.
Z to speed up.

game.title: Off Roaders 2
game.controls:
Arrow keys to drive
P to pause
game.description: Off Roaders 2 is a rare, 3D racing gem! With excellent graphics and a clean interface, this game is very easy to get into! In your race with other truckers, you have to get first place in order to advance to the next stage. The road out there is muddy though, and it won't be easy to guide your truck through it all, so be careful!
game.instructions:
Arrow keys to drive
P to pause

game.title: Seedz
game.controls: Use the mouse to select your vegetable and plant them in the ground.
game.description: Evil fruits are attacking, and they're after your pumpkin seeds! Gather your vegetable army and fight the invaders in this funny and challenging defense strategy game! Plant your forces wisely to keep the fruits from stealing all of your pumpkin seeds, upgrade your veggies or sell them to make money and build a more powerful defense!
game.instructions: Use the mouse to select your vegetable and plant them in the ground.

game.title: Alias Runner Apocalypse
game.controls: Use the arrow keys to control your car.
game.description: Drive for as long as you can, avoiding the pursuers hot on your tail! Keep your fuel topped up and drive skillfully in order to survive in this fantastic 3D driving game! Avoid crashing into buildings and other cars so as not to damage your only means of transportation, and make sure to pick up fuel and wrenches to fix your car on the way!
game.instructions: Use the arrow keys to control your car.

game.title: Tennis
game.controls: Use the mouse to move your player while left click to swing.
game.description: The title says it all! Test your tennis skills in this fun and addictive sports simulation game! Grab your racket and sweatband and prepare yourself for more and more difficult matches! Are you good enough to beat your opponents? Play through the tournament and prove you're worthy of winning the trophy!
game.instructions: Use the mouse to move your player while left click to swing.

game.title: Crazy Battle
game.controls: Use the mouse to move your crosshair and left click to shoot.
game.description: Crazy Battle is a War game. Aiming to defend your base through 20 levels of attacks. You must control your helicopter to kill all the enemies before your base is destroyed. You will earn money for every enemy you kill. War is expansive, so use the money wisely to upgrade the your helicopter or place cannons and bombs or repair the base.
game.instructions: Use the mouse to move your crosshair and left click to shoot.

game.title: Bedazzled
game.controls: Use the mouse to click on a gem. Click an adjacent gem to swap positions.
game.description: Match the jewels in this beautiful and addictive puzzle game. Match at least three of the colorful stones to make them disappear. Create combos and match more gems together to create special explosions, lightning bolts and fires to increase your score! Be quick to replenish the time bar, and make sure not to let time run out!
game.instructions: Use the mouse to click on a gem. Click an adjacent gem to swap positions.

game.title: Twitchpack
game.controls:
Use the mouse to steer your rocketpack in the right direction. 
Hold left mouse button to use the rocketpack.
game.description: Survive a meteorite onslaught in this old-style flying game! Steer your rocket-pack and collect coins and items in the sky while you try and avoid the deadly rocks falling upon you! Collect enough coins while soaring high in the sky to upgrade your equipment and weaponry. Are your flying skills good enough to achieve a high score?
game.instructions:
Use the mouse to steer your rocketpack in the right direction. 
Hold left mouse button to use the rocketpack.

game.title: School Bus License 2
game.controls: Use the arrow keys to drive, but make sure you don't hit anything or you'll fail.
game.description: School Bus License the is an american School Bus Driving Simulation Game. Your aim in this game is to get through a set amount of test that will teach you how to drive a school bus. You will learn everything from parking, reversing and driving a bus full of children through harsh weather conditions etc.
game.instructions: Use the arrow keys to drive, but make sure you don't hit anything or you'll fail.

game.title: Material Mole 2
game.controls:
Use the arrow keys to drive
Shift to drop hidden items
Space to move ramps and barriers 
Z to use a speed boost
game.description: Material Mole is back! Can you deliver all the loads before time runs out? Get in your truck and carry everything to its destination as quickly as you can! Drop the items on your way, switch tracks to speed up your trip and collect all the hidden gems and items you find in your path with your trolley cart! Can you find them all?
game.instructions:
Use the arrow keys to drive
Shift to drop hidden items
Space to move ramps and barriers 
Z to use a speed boost

game.title: Lunar Commander
game.controls: Use the mouse to build structures, command units and upgrade your base.
game.description: Build mines, energy plants and barracks to raise your army in this addictive real time strategy game set on a barren battleground in the depths of space! Upgrade your buildings and units to protect your base from the waves of relentless enemies that will swarm the screen as soon as the time runs out!
game.instructions: Use the mouse to build structures, command units and upgrade your base.

game.title: Ufo Terminator
game.controls: Use the mouse to aim, left click to shoot.
game.description: Save the people in your village from the invading UFOs! Don't let your fellow citizens get abducted in this addictive shooter! Upgrade your firepower and skills as you progress: the aliens will become stronger and faster with every level! Can you save the day and repel the alien menace once and for all?
game.instructions: Use the mouse to aim, left click to shoot.

game.title: Hit Logic Level Pack
game.controls: Use the mouse to aim and shoot.
game.description: Hit Logic is back with even more fiendish checker puzzles for you to solve! Get all the red pieces out of the board in the smallest amount of moves, and be careful not to dispose of the other colors! Can you solve all the puzzles or will you give up? Your logic skills will be put to the test in this difficult puzzle game!
game.instructions: Use the mouse to aim and shoot.

game.title: Construction Breaker
game.controls: Use the mouse to draw the cut lines
game.description: Cut the shapes to make them all fall below the line on the screen and pass the level. But be careful! You only have three possible cuts in each level and need to make them count! This relaxing and addictive puzzle will have you scratching your head a few times as you test your logic skills to get to the solution!
game.instructions: Use the mouse to draw the cut lines

game.title: Paper Floods 2
game.controls: Use the mouse to move your pieces and left click to place them
game.description: Save even more dudes from drowning in this challenging sequel to the original Paper Floods! Clear the flood-stricken people's path in order for them to float back to the surface and catch some air! Can you solve the intricate puzzles with only the few objects you have at your disposal? Test your logic skills with this challenging and addictive doodle game!
game.instructions: Use the mouse to move your pieces and left click to place them

game.title: The Railway Robot's Road Trip
game.controls: Use the mouse to click sections of the track in order to move them along with Robby the Robot.
game.description: Help Robby the Railway Robot reach his lovely robo-girlfriend Roberta! Aide him by switching and rotating part of the railway, while accumulating as many points as you can to raise your score! But be wary of the evil robotic policemen that will try to stop you, and avoid the mat all costs! An addictive puzzler that will test your logic!
game.instructions: Use the mouse to click sections of the track in order to move them along with Robby the Robot.

game.title: Color Traffic 2
game.controls: Use the mouse in-game to control the traffic flow
game.description: Back for more Color Traffic? Direct the differently colored cars in the right direction as fast as you can to achieve the highest score possible! Prevent disastrous collisions and traffic jams on the roads as you carry out your job. But be careful! The levels will greatly increase in difficulty as you go along!
game.instructions: Use the mouse in-game to control the traffic flow

game.title: Truck Rush Seasons
game.controls: Use the mouse to click to accelerate.
game.description: Click your mouse to accelerate in this simple but fun racing game! Race your truck and avoid all obstacles in the shortest time possible! Be careful, every level is different and the moving obstacles will make your life that little bit harder soon enough! The longer you hold the left click button down, the faster you go, the higher the score. But the faster you go, the harder it will be to avoid the moving blocks!
game.instructions: Use the mouse to click to accelerate.

game.title: Bar Balance
game.controls: Use the mouse to move your brick and left click to drop.
game.description: Balance as many crates crates as you can on the bar in the short time given you! Dropping the crates on the edges will greatly increase your score, but be careful! The bar will start leaning one way and the other as weight accumulates on its sides, and as soon as a crate drop it's game over! Will you play it safe or go for the highest score possible?
game.instructions: Use the mouse to move your brick and left click to drop.

game.title: Ferrari Enzo Racing Jigsaw Puzzle
game.controls: Use your mouse to arrange the pieces.
game.description: A beautiful jigsaw puzzle featuring a Ferrari Enzo. Three levels of difficulty to test your skills! A timeless past time directly on your computer screen! Position your jigsaw pieces in the right orientation in order to recreate the picture of the car. Remember this is all about fun so take your time and admire the picture when you accomplish your goal.
game.instructions: Use your mouse to arrange the pieces.

game.title: Bugatti Veyron Jigsaw Puzzle
game.controls: Use your mouse to arrange the pieces.
game.description: A beautiful jigsaw puzzle featuring a Bugatti Veyron. Three levels of difficulty to test your skills! A timeless past time directly on your computer screen! Position your jigsaw pieces in the right orientation in order to recreate the picture of the car. Remember this is all about fun so take your time and admire the picture when you accomplish your goal.
game.instructions: Use your mouse to arrange the pieces.

game.title: Ducklings Adventure
game.controls: Click differences.
game.description: Sit back and relax with this colourful spot-the-difference game, a beautiful rendition of one of the most classic past times right on your computer screen! Follow Ducky the Duckling through his adventure while spotting the differences in two seemingly identical pictures. Three levels of difficulty to test your observational skills!
game.instructions: Click differences.

game.title: Asteroid Mining Empire
game.controls: Use the mouse for all actions.
game.description: Welcome to the cruel and cut-throat world of the space mining industry! Build your mining station and expand your empire throughout the cosmos in this challenging strategy game! Defend your station from enemies and annihilate the competition, while you excavate all the precious minerals you can from asteroid nodes.
game.instructions: Use the mouse for all actions.

game.title: Tower Moon
game.controls: Use the mouse to command units by left clicking them then clicking where on the level you want them to go. Finally click go to complete the move.
game.description: The prince has been kidnapped by a vicious dragon! Only the princess is now left to save him. It's time to gather all your forces and rescue him from the certain doom that awaits him in Tower Moon! Select your troops wisely and move through each level without fail in this quirky strategy game! Will your wits save the kingdom?
game.instructions: Use the mouse to command units by left clicking them then clicking where on the level you want them to go. Finally click go to complete the move.

game.title: Penalties
game.controls:
Determine the angle, power and curve of shot - press spacebar at the appropriate time.
Dive for the ball - Use the arrow keys.
game.description: The 90th minute has passed and the match is at a draw. You and your team now have to take part in the dreaded penalty shootout! Can you keep your composure and win the trophy as you conclude the match? Choose your players carefully and strike as many goals as you can in this addictive sports game! Are your feet good enough?
game.instructions:
Determine the angle, power and curve of shot - press spacebar at the appropriate time.
Dive for the ball - Use the arrow keys.

game.title: Deep Diver 2
game.controls: Use the Arrow Keys to move your sub around the ocean depths. Mouse is needed to use the menu options.
game.description: Dive deep into the oceans of the world in search of the rare artifacts that will enable you to continue your research! Collect treasure and rare fish specimens to improve your score and gain enough money to upgrade your submarine! Be careful not to run out of oxygen, though, and beware of the many enemies you'll find on your way!
game.instructions: Use the Arrow Keys to move your sub around the ocean depths. Mouse is needed to use the menu options.

game.title: 3D Quad Bike Racing
game.controls:
Accelerate - Up arrow key
Turn - Left/right arrow keys
Brake - Spacebar
game.description: Race your opponents all the way to the finish line on your trusty quad bike in this exciting racing game! Five maps to complete, each one bumpier than the other! Can you place first on all of them and prove yourself worthy of the trophy? Be careful, though, the race is not going to be as simple as it looks!
game.instructions:
Accelerate - Up arrow key
Turn - Left/right arrow keys
Brake - Spacebar

game.title: Wild West Showdown
game.controls: Use the mouse to aim and left click to shoot.
game.description: The Wild West is a dangerous place: trouble and troublemakers are to be found around every corner. And you are right in the middle of it all! Relying only on the faithful revolver always by your side, can you survive the dangers you'll encounter? Use your mouse to aim and shoot in this addictive duelling game!
game.instructions: Use the mouse to aim and left click to shoot.

game.title: Parabirds
game.controls:
Use the mouse to aim the cannon. Left click to shoot.
Be sure to lead your target to take shell velocity into account.
game.description: The birds are attacking the Beavers! Flying above, they're bombarding you with their elite paratroopers! Get on board the Beaver Cannon and shoot down your aggressors before they drop their dangerous cargo! Upgrade your cannon as you progress in the game. Can you save the Beavers from the feathered menace?
game.instructions:
Use the mouse to aim the cannon. Left click to shoot.
Be sure to lead your target to take shell velocity into account.

game.title: I Need Air
game.controls:
Aim with the mouse
Left click to shoot
game.description: I Need Air! The title explains it all! IN this Puzzle Game you have to rescue the men trapped underwater by shooting at their shackles and setting them free before they drown. Once the chains are broken the men will go up for much needed air. But wait! You have to also move and clear their path to get up to the surface. You must hurry up as they are running out of breath!
game.instructions:
Aim with the mouse
Left click to shoot

game.title: Word Groove
game.controls: Either use the mouse to click on the letters or use your keyboard to press the letters.
game.description: Word Groove is an entertaining English Word Game. In the game you must select how many letters you wish to use. Once you do this you click on each letter in order to form a word, if you are successful the first letter of that word will be removed. You must repeat this process with the remaining letters until all letters are removed in order to win the game.
game.instructions: Either use the mouse to click on the letters or use your keyboard to press the letters.

game.title: Genetic Madness
game.controls:
WSAD to move
Mouse to aim and shoot
Number keys to change mutation.
game.description: Monsters have conquered the town, and it's up to you to stand against the evil aggressors and defeat them! Study their technology in order to mutate into more powerful forms and destroy the monsters! Use their own forms against them, earn money to upgrade your weapons and powers! This little side-scrolling shooter will have you addicted in no time!
game.instructions:
WSAD to move
Mouse to aim and shoot
Number keys to change mutation.

game.title: Sweet Tooth Sammy
game.controls:
Arrow keys to move
Arrow keys + space to drill to the left/right/up/down
game.description: The day of Apocalypse has come: Earth has run out of sweets. You're Sammy, an astronaut who was given a very important and peculiar job: travel to distant planets in the Sugar Galaxy and dig right into their core to collect candy! You're all alone in your mission, and monsters lurk in the planets' depths. Can you stay alive and carry out your mission?
game.instructions:
Arrow keys to move
Arrow keys + space to drill to the left/right/up/down

game.title: Boom Boom Bloon
game.controls: Aim and shoot - Use mouse to aim, left click to shoot.
game.description: Boom Boom Bloon! Rescue the good balloon and test your aiming skills to destroy the bad balloons. This game is all about accuracy and precision, make your shot, but make it wisely in this strategy-shooter game! Do you think you have what it takes to rescue the good balloons and destroy the bad balloons? Well good luck!
game.instructions: Aim and shoot - Use mouse to aim, left click to shoot.

game.title: Hell Diggers
game.controls:
Move characters - Click on character and drag
Dig - Drag the cursor over the surface
game.description: Help the Hell Diggers get their gold back to the surface in this difficult puzzler! Dig around the blocks of gold with your miners and push them on your vehicle to get them out of the cave. Can you find the perfect way to retrieve all the precious ore? Test your logic with this old-style little game!
game.instructions:
Move characters - Click on character and drag
Dig - Drag the cursor over the surface

game.title: Dancing With Shadows
game.controls: Use the arrow keys to run and jump in order to avoid the dangers and unlock the keys.
game.description: Dance with the Shadows in this beautifully stylized platforming puzzler! Open the book to immerse yourself in the world of ancient thieves! Overcome obstacles and dangers, unlock doors through complex codes and make your way through each chapter in order to steal the valuable goods and prove your thieving skills!
game.instructions: Use the arrow keys to run and jump in order to avoid the dangers and unlock the keys.

game.title: Treasure Cannon
game.controls:
Controls:
Aiming - move the mouse cursor to adjust the angle and power of shot.
Shooting - when you're happy with the shot, just click to fire!
Collecting bonuses - move the mouse cursor over falling bonuses to catch them. No need to click!

To unlock the next level you have to hit at least all the Primary Treasure Bricks (marked by a pulsing red glow).
game.description: Old Templar vaults are full of treasure, and you're out to get it all! Use your cannon to shoot and destroy treasure bricks, but be quick to collect the bonus coins that come out of them! Collect as many bonuses as possible, and be sure to hit all the red glowing bricks before your cannon balls run out!
game.instructions:
Controls:
Aiming - move the mouse cursor to adjust the angle and power of shot.
Shooting - when you're happy with the shot, just click to fire!
Collecting bonuses - move the mouse cursor over falling bonuses to catch them. No need to click!

To unlock the next level you have to hit at least all the Primary Treasure Bricks (marked by a pulsing red glow).

game.title: Colonize Me
game.controls: Use the mouse to move your pieces.
game.description: Put your wits to the test in this epic and difficult board game! Colonize the board with your pieces as quickly and cunningly as you can, lest your enemy make them all disappear right in front of your eyes! Pit your logic skills against a mystical wizard, a bold knight, an agile elf or a dastardly skeleton! Can you conquer the board?
game.instructions: Use the mouse to move your pieces.

game.title: Pick n Dig
game.controls: Use the arrow keys to control your character.
game.description: Pick and Dig is Puzzle game in which you collect all the mining tools and use them to clear your path and reach the exit! Use pick-axes, shovels and ladders to collect keys and open doors. Avoid your enemies and be careful not to get stuck! This game will put your logic to the test as you try and solve its increasingly difficult puzzles to complete each level! If you get stuck, you can RESTART again anytime.
game.instructions: Use the arrow keys to control your character.

game.title: Trolley Express
game.controls: Use the arrow keys to move.
game.description: Can you deliver all the right packages to the right customers before the time runs out? Help your trolley delivery service deliver the goods on time in this quirky drive-and-delivery game! Guide the trolley on the road using your keyboard arrows, but don't overdo it! Speeding up too much will make it difficult to stop under the right shops, and you don't want to break any crates!
game.instructions: Use the arrow keys to move.

game.title: Burger Cat
game.controls: Use the mouse to place your tools in order to guide the cat to the burger
game.description: Help the cat reach the tasty burgers in this old-style, meme-inspired puzzler! Point and click with your mouse to change the structure of the levels, add or remove blocks of terrain, create trampolines, avoid traps and much more! But be quick, the cat won't stop walking towards his goal! Can you keep up as the levels become more and more difficult?
game.instructions: Use the mouse to place your tools in order to guide the cat to the burger

game.title: Color World Origins
game.controls: Use the mouse to aim and shoot the balls, use the number keys to switch color when needed.
game.description: Once again you can kill some time with the addictive Color World! It might seem simple at first, but you'll find yourself soon wondering how to get to the next level! Make the colour of the boxes match that of the character inside them using the fluffy balls in your cannon: the less you have to shoot, the higher the score! Teleporters, trolley carts and gravity wells will have you scratch your head as you try to figure out a way to beat the game!
game.instructions: Use the mouse to aim and shoot the balls, use the number keys to switch color when needed.

game.title: TV Darts Show
game.controls:
Use the mouse to aim your dart.
Left click to start the accuracy meter, in the middle for the best shot then click again to throw.
game.description: TV Darts is a skill game unlike other dart games you are likely to play. You must hit the glowing targets on the dart board with your limited amount of darts to move onto the next level, however this is not as easy as it seems. Your hand is constantly moving and the targets always changing, but with great risks come even greater rewards, as you progress through the level your prize fund will increase.
game.instructions:
Use the mouse to aim your dart.
Left click to start the accuracy meter, in the middle for the best shot then click again to throw.

game.title: Find The Suspect: Extended Edition
game.controls: Select a suspect - use the mouse
game.description: Identify all the suspects! You only have a couple of seconds to memorize their faces, then you'll have to identify their shadow! Test your memory with this challenging little puzzle. But be careful, the number of suspects will increase with each round! How many of them can you remember? Prove your skill and let justice be served!
game.instructions: Select a suspect - use the mouse

game.title: Ageless War
game.controls: Use the mouse in game to position buildings etc.
game.description: Wage war against armies across all of time! Choose an army from your favourite era, be it the middle ages, today or the future! Build your city placing buildings to produce soldiers, upgrade their weaponry and equipment and obliterate the enemy in this exhilarating side-scrolling strategy came! Did we mention you also get to use ninjas?
game.instructions: Use the mouse in game to position buildings etc.

game.title: Robotic Emergence 2
game.controls: Use the mouse to place and upgrade your buildings, towers and boosters.
game.description: Humans have apparently been extinct for over a century and robots have taken their place as rulers of the world. But a small group of humans has returned to claim back the Earth! Build your factory city in this challenging strategy game, create robots to fight against the enemy and take over their land to bring Earth once more back to life!
game.instructions: Use the mouse to place and upgrade your buildings, towers and boosters.

game.title: Heaven or Hell 2
game.controls: Use the mouse to select your actions or use the in-game keyboard shortcuts.
game.description: The fight between Good and Evil is an endless one, except the fight now has become a full on war. First Select your team members, arrange them in a battle formation and then go to war. Once in a fight you click on your team members and they will give you options to either attack or defend. You can also put your team members on auto pilot. You can move characters around if you wish to. Buy more of the same or different kind of troops and weapons to fight the demons, gain money and upgrade your army to destroy the spawn of the Devil!
game.instructions: Use the mouse to select your actions or use the in-game keyboard shortcuts.

game.title: Azurefish
game.controls: Control the fish - use the mouse
game.description: For those that missed Ecco The Dolphins' appearance, enter Azurefish! Control your sea-faring creature in 20 objectives, while collecting objects along the way (about 240+ collectibles in total). Participate in races, answer quizzes and more. The scenery will bring you in and keep you for a long time. Hold your breath!
game.instructions: Control the fish - use the mouse

game.title: Get Off My Roof
game.controls:
Controls:
Left Mouse: Throw Projectile
Spacebar: Jump
A: Move Left
D: Move Right
W: Swing Melee Weapon
Q: Use Wetnap (Heal one heart)
[1-2]: Switch Projectile Weapon

P: Pause
game.description: Get Off My Roof is an Arcade Shooting Game in which you must try and use rocks and other weapons like newspapers, brooms etc to knock pigeons off your roof! You must at the same time avoid being hit by their toxic poo. You can clean yourself by using the Q button. You earn money for every pigeon you knock off the roof, use this money to purchase new destructive weapons.
game.instructions:
Controls:
Left Mouse: Throw Projectile
Spacebar: Jump
A: Move Left
D: Move Right
W: Swing Melee Weapon
Q: Use Wetnap (Heal one heart)
[1-2]: Switch Projectile Weapon

P: Pause

game.title: Paper Floods
game.controls: Move objects - Use the mouse to drag objects around he screen.
game.description: Save a dude from drowning in this beautifully stylized doodle game! Clear his path in order for him to float back to the surface and catch some air! Can you solve the intricate puzzles with only the few objects you have at your disposal? Test your logic skills with this challenging and addictive little game!
game.instructions: Move objects - Use the mouse to drag objects around he screen.

game.title: Fly And Blast
game.controls: Use the mouse for movement and left click to shoot
game.description: Repel the UFO invasion and save humanity in this addictive and challenging side-scrolling shooter! Choose between a Harrier Aircraft, an Apache Longbow or the Prototype Exo Battle Suit and start fighting the aliens! Gain coins from the flying saucers you destroy and improve your armament to defeat even the most difficult bosses!
game.instructions: Use the mouse for movement and left click to shoot

game.title: World Cup Cricket Practice
game.controls: Use the mouse to move the cricket bat.
game.description: Practice your Cricket skills and get ready for the World Cup! Use your mouse to move the bat and hit the ball, but be quick, the balls won't stop coming and you only have one wicket (1 life). You can hit singles, Doubles, Fours and sixes. You can be caught out or balled by a variety of slow, medium and fast paced balls. Get as many runs as you can to increase your top score and prove yourself ready for the national team selection committee!
game.instructions: Use the mouse to move the cricket bat.

game.title: Navy Glory
game.controls:
Use the mouse to aim your cannons, left click to shoot.

A - Anti Ship cannon

S - Anti Air Cannon

D - Anti Submarine Torpedos
game.description: Navy Glory is a Defense Game set in the sea. You have to defend your warship as you return home from the victorious war! In a last ditch attempt to changes the outcome of the war, the Blue Army is desperately attempting at sinking you. They are attacking using hordes of enemy ships, planes and submarines! Use three different weapons and power ups to survive the long trip back.
game.instructions:
Use the mouse to aim your cannons, left click to shoot.

A - Anti Ship cannon

S - Anti Air Cannon

D - Anti Submarine Torpedos

game.title: 3D Stunt Pilot
game.controls: Use the mouse to control your aircraft
game.description: Ever wished to fly a plane? Even better, ever wished to race one? We can't give you a plane, but 3D Stunt Pilot is certainly a great place to start! Race your plane through the courses in the fastest time possible. Use your mouse to move the plane and be sure to pass over the turbo boosters to break records!
game.instructions: Use the mouse to control your aircraft

game.title: Tower of ZZZ
game.controls: Use either the mouse on the slider, A and D keys or Left and Right arrow keys to rotate your elevators around your hotel building to save your guests.
game.description: The guests of your hotel have started sleepwalking! It's up to you to catch them with your elevators and bring them safely back to the lobby before they fall out of the hallway windows! Move the elevators around the building to catch a variety of weird and wonderful guests and save the day in Tower of ZZZ!
game.instructions: Use either the mouse on the slider, A and D keys or Left and Right arrow keys to rotate your elevators around your hotel building to save your guests.

game.title: High Rise
game.controls: Press the mouse button to drop the blocks, you get bonus points for landing a brick directly on-top of your last.
game.description: Build the worlds tallest tower in this simple yet addictive tower building game. You are in control of a crane that is dropping block on top of block to build the tower. The secret is to be patient and try to align the blocks perfectly on top of each other. If the block are not aligned properly they will fall down and you only have 3 spare blocks before its game over. Challenge a friend and see who can stack the most blocks.
game.instructions: Press the mouse button to drop the blocks, you get bonus points for landing a brick directly on-top of your last.

game.title: Paper Kid
game.controls: Use the arrow keys to control your bike while space bar throws your papers.
game.description: Paper Kid is a bike based Delivery Game. You take on the role of the neighbourhood's newspaper delivery boy and deliver all the papers you can. You have to keep control of your bike and throw the papers from your bike whilst cars, dogs and passers-by will make your job much more difficult than you'd expect! The more papers you deliver, the more customers you'll gain!
game.instructions: Use the arrow keys to control your bike while space bar throws your papers.

game.title: Randy's Empire
game.controls: Select an option - Use the mouse
game.description: Randys Empire a game based on the life of a Gangster. At each step of the game you are given multiple choices, whatever you choose will happen in the game. Be is the right choice or wrong choice. The Story begins with Randy leaving prison and getting back to hi old villainous deeds. He wants to become the top dog of the criminal underworld. But his position is jeopardised when a bunch of thugs break into his headquarters and try to take him down. Help Randy escape their clutches and find out who's behind this attempted assasination!
game.instructions: Select an option - Use the mouse

game.title: Brick Galaxy
game.controls: Use the A and D keys to move your orbital platform. Alternatively you may use the left and right arrow keys.
game.description: In Brick Galaxy it's time to defend the earth in this twist on the old breakout style of super cool game play! Instead of breaking bricks you're defending them against dangerous meteor strikes from the evil invading space panda. Use the A and D keys to move your orbital platform. Alternatively you may use the left and right arrow keys.
game.instructions: Use the A and D keys to move your orbital platform. Alternatively you may use the left and right arrow keys.

game.title: Hit Logic
game.controls: Left click the checker then drag to adjust angle and power. Let go to shoot.
game.description: In Hit Logicyour goal is to shoot red checkers! Do you have the eagle eye of a military-trained sniper? Then take on Hit Logic and knock out all of the red checkers in the least amount of moves as is humanly possible! Left click the checker then drag to adjust the angle and power then let go to shoot.
game.instructions: Left click the checker then drag to adjust angle and power. Let go to shoot.

game.title: Kaban Racetrack
game.controls:
Use W + S or Up and Down Arrow keys to move Kaban.
Spacebar to jump.

Alternatively you can move the mouse and click to jump.
game.description: Kaban Racetrack  Racing Game. Kaban the running boar starts a sport career. Take part in raceS at tracks. Run as many laps as possible. Accelerate! Be as fast as light! Explore tracks and find best paths, avoid obstacles, jump, fly with jet packs, buy upgrades, earn achivements and reach incredible speeds. Help Kaban become the champion of the RACE TRACK.
game.instructions:
Use W + S or Up and Down Arrow keys to move Kaban.
Spacebar to jump.

Alternatively you can move the mouse and click to jump.

game.title: Valet Parking
game.controls:
Use the arrow keys to walk around the parking lots as well as drive the cars.

Use the Spacebar to enter and exit the cars.
game.description: You need to make some extra cash so you become the newest Valet Parking attendant at the local country club. Ensure you park the members cars carefully otherwise the cost of the damages will come out of your pocket! Bash the cars too much and you'll get fired too, so be careful. You must collect their cars from the correct parking space once they come back too!
game.instructions:
Use the arrow keys to walk around the parking lots as well as drive the cars.

Use the Spacebar to enter and exit the cars.

game.title: Cops vs Supers
game.controls: Left click and drag to adjust power and angle, then release to launch your officer through the air.
game.description: In Cops vs Supers, the populace have voted, and everyone is sick of the Superheroes doing what they please. It's time to take them down with the long arm of the law. Fire your police officers at the Superheroes, by clicking and dragging, to take them out! Now is the time to protect the planet from these vigilante wannabees!
game.instructions: Left click and drag to adjust power and angle, then release to launch your officer through the air.

game.title: Counter Specialist
game.controls:
Move - W,A,S,D keys
Attack/shoot - Use the mouse
Switch weapons - 1-4 number keys
Defuse bomb/release hostage - E key
Quick swap - Q key
Reload - Spacebar
Show map - X key
game.description: In Counter Specialist, war has erupted, and in-between the massive fights, there are small squabbles that need to be dealt with. Using your mouse and keyboard, you'll need to fight off terrorists, defuse bombs, rescue hostages and more! Hint: E defuses a bomb and SPACE-BAR reloads. Switch your guns with Q. Complete the objectives, or die trying!
game.instructions:
Move - W,A,S,D keys
Attack/shoot - Use the mouse
Switch weapons - 1-4 number keys
Defuse bomb/release hostage - E key
Quick swap - Q key
Reload - Spacebar
Show map - X key

game.title: Getaway
game.controls:
· Accelerate - Up arrow key.
· Decelerate - Down arrow key.
· Turn left/right - Left/right arrow keys respectively.
game.description: In Getaway, you and your fellow criminals have just committed a heist and have made away with a ton of loot!  It's up to you to get them to their destination safely, but the police won't make it easy for you!  Dodge and weave your way to victory and make the perfect getaway with your bag full of loot?.
game.instructions:
· Accelerate - Up arrow key.
· Decelerate - Down arrow key.
· Turn left/right - Left/right arrow keys respectively.

game.title: 3D Quick Pool
game.controls:
Determine angle - Move mouse left and right
Determine power - Move mouse up and down
Shoot - Double click the cue
game.description: In 3D Quick Pool, your goal is to test your pool-shooting skill and accuracy on this super cool small pool table and pot all your balls into the hole in this challenging and awesome mini 3D pool game! Do you have what it takes? Will your aim be true or will you miss the holes!? Good luck, and have fun!
game.instructions:
Determine angle - Move mouse left and right
Determine power - Move mouse up and down
Shoot - Double click the cue

game.title: Army Training
game.controls:
Move around environment - W,A,S,D keys
Aim - Use mouse keys
Shoot - Left mouse button
game.description: Prove you're the best soldier by taking down forces in a challenging training ground.  Shoot down wooden targets while rescuing hostages as fast as you can!  Be careful, there's not much time and you have limited ammo!  Every bullet counts, so make sure you hit enemies, and not the innocent hostages!
game.instructions:
Move around environment - W,A,S,D keys
Aim - Use mouse keys
Shoot - Left mouse button

game.title: Basketball Shots
game.controls: · Aim and shoot - Use the mouse to aim, left click to shoot the ball.
game.description: Basketball Shots is a Basketball Shooting Simulation Game. Use your mouse to set the angle of the throw and Click to shoot. You have 20 tries to score the most points you can. To make the game more realistic, the player is moved randomly around the court. Points are based on how far you can shoot from. You never know the NBA selection team might be watching you play.
game.instructions: · Aim and shoot - Use the mouse to aim, left click to shoot the ball.

game.title: Dash Or Crash
game.controls: and andlt;bandgt;Speed up Vehiclesandlt;/bandgt; - Left Click
game.description: In Dash Or Crash, keep your wits about you and your reactions sharp, as the traffic at this busy intersection is moving without working traffic lights! Make the vehicles speed up to avoid nasty fender benders and ensure that you keep that traffic flowing. Remember, make them dash or prepare to crash!
game.instructions: and andlt;bandgt;Speed up Vehiclesandlt;/bandgt; - Left Click

game.title: Squash
game.controls:
· Move player - Use the mouse.
· Hit the ball - Click and hold left mouse button to determine power, release to hit.
game.description: In Squash, your goal is to prove your skills by hitting the ball against the wall in an attempt to make your opponent miss the rebound!  Be careful though as you have to hit it above the line and the opponent will try and throw you off from hitting the ball too. Move your player by using  the mouse and click and hold left mouse button to determine power then finally release the button to hit.
game.instructions:
· Move player - Use the mouse.
· Hit the ball - Click and hold left mouse button to determine power, release to hit.

game.title: Bowls
game.controls:
· Aim - Left/right arrow keys.
· Determine power - Hold down the spacebar, release to bowl.
game.description: Test your skills and accuracy with this awesome online strategy game of Bowls. This competitive bowls game is an awesome way to test your skills on the bowling green. Have fun and make yourself even better at bowls than before. Compete with your Facebook friends on the leader boards and try to become the champion!
game.instructions:
· Aim - Left/right arrow keys.
· Determine power - Hold down the spacebar, release to bowl.

game.title: Luchador Cannon Blast
game.controls: Use the mouse to aim the cannon and left click to fire.
game.description: Match up the mysterious masked Luchador Cannon Blast wrestlers in this exciting match three puzzle game. Fire the Luchadores out of the cannon and make sure they don't collapse the stage. Become a wrestler and enter the arena and challenge increasingly difficult opponents to work your way up to becoming the ultimate wrestler.
game.instructions: Use the mouse to aim the cannon and left click to fire.

game.title: Twilight BMX
game.controls:
Accelerate - Up arrow key.
Decelerate - Down arrow key.
Lean - Left-right arrow keys.
Perform tricks - W,A,S,D keys.
game.description: Twilight BMX is Side Scrolling Bike Game. In this game a massive tornado is chasing you and all you have on your side is your old trusty bmx bike. Ride your bike on the rough hills and various obstacles as you go for the ride of your life! The aim of the game is to outrun the tornado for as long as possible. You can enhance your end score by using WASD to perform stylish tricks whilst in the air.
game.instructions:
Accelerate - Up arrow key.
Decelerate - Down arrow key.
Lean - Left-right arrow keys.
Perform tricks - W,A,S,D keys.

game.title: Freecell Solitaire
game.controls: The object of the game is to build up all cards on foundations from Ace to King by following suit. You win when all 52 cards are moved there, 13 to a pile. Use your mouse to move the cards.
game.description: Freecell Solitaire is a Card Game. The object of the game is to build up all cards on foundations from Ace to King by following suit. You win when all 52 cards are moved there, 13 to a pile. Use your mouse to move the cards. While playing the game you can only put alternating colors on top of each other, such as black cards on top of red cards. Black on black or red on red will not be accepted.
game.instructions: The object of the game is to build up all cards on foundations from Ace to King by following suit. You win when all 52 cards are moved there, 13 to a pile. Use your mouse to move the cards.

game.title: Creepy Columns
game.controls:
Curser Keys = left, right and rotate
Space = drop quickly
P = pause
M = Mute
game.description: Creepy Columns a Match Making Puzzle Game. This Game is perfect for the Haloween Season. In this scary game you have to match the falling pumkins, dried heads and scary relic tiles in groups of 3 or more. Shapes can be matched in all directions. Game ends when tiles hit the roof and no more combos can be made.
game.instructions:
Curser Keys = left, right and rotate
Space = drop quickly
P = pause
M = Mute

game.title: Fat Fred
game.controls: Movements - Use Arrow Keys.
game.description: This is a simple but nice flash game, where you have to help Fat Fred in locating and then eating all the hamburgers before time runs out and score maximum points. To clear all the 17 exciting levels, you need be careful from falling off the platforms, as they can be a threat to your life in further levels beside reducing the score. Just play and enjoy!
game.instructions: Movements - Use Arrow Keys.

game.title: Truck Loader
game.controls:
· Move left/right - A/D or left/right arrow keys
· Control arm - Use mouse to direct, left click to magnetise the arm.
game.description: Do you have the dexterity to become an expert Truck Loader? Use your magnetic lift pully to get the goods in the back of the pickup truck for transporting. Load up the trucks and send them on their way in 20 different challenging levels. Truck loader is a test of patience and mouse skills, requiring practice.
game.instructions:
· Move left/right - A/D or left/right arrow keys
· Control arm - Use mouse to direct, left click to magnetise the arm.

game.title: Dungeon Hunt
game.controls:
· Movements - Arrow Keys
· Shoot - Space Bar
· Use potion - Enter
game.description: Dungeon hunt an utter classic similar in style to another great game gauntlet, in this game you have to survive and escape. Wherever you turn you see zombies, destroy the grave stones to prevent more and more uncontrollable zombies from spawning and stopping you in your effots to escape, gather keys, gold and potions to help you survive your worst nightmare.
game.instructions:
· Movements - Arrow Keys
· Shoot - Space Bar
· Use potion - Enter

game.title: Tower Supremo
game.controls:
and Move the crane - Use the mouse
and Grab a piece - Left click
and Release a piece - Left click once a piece is grabbed
and Rotate piece - Spacebar
game.description: Tower Supremo is a Physics Game, where the challenge is to stack the limited number of blocks to build the tallest tower possible. Do not let it get too unstable or else it will fall like a house of cards! You can choose which blocks you want to use where. Use the mouse to move your crane, grab the bricks and leave them where you want. Use the space-bar key to spin the bricks.
game.instructions:
and Move the crane - Use the mouse
and Grab a piece - Left click
and Release a piece - Left click once a piece is grabbed
and Rotate piece - Spacebar

game.title: Rock Paper Scissors Tournament
game.controls: and andlt;bandgt;Select rock/paper/scissorsandlt;/bandgt; - Use the mouse to click on the appropriate icon before the timer runs out.
game.description: How do you decide who does what in life? It's the old fashioned way that counts: Rock Paper Scissors, in a cartoon Japanese style! But how good are you at this game? Remember Rock beats Scissors, Paper beats Rock and Scissors beats Paper. Is it intuition or just good luck that will bring you victory? Rock, paper or scissors?
game.instructions: and andlt;bandgt;Select rock/paper/scissorsandlt;/bandgt; - Use the mouse to click on the appropriate icon before the timer runs out.

game.title: Fog Sudoku
game.controls:
and andlt;bandgt;Select squareandlt;/bandgt; - Use the mouse.
and andlt;bandgt;Switch between pencil/eraserandlt;/bandgt; - Spacebar
and andlt;bandgt;Input numberandlt;/bandgt; - 1 - 9 number keys
game.description: The classic mind-wracking math puzzle game is now online! With a brad new look: the old fashioned news paper style. Fill in each gap with the correct number from 1 to 9. Be careful not to have the same number on a row or column. You have your own scribble pad to help you out in case you need some aid. Start easy at first and go for challenging hard levels afterward for an awesome experience.
game.instructions:
and andlt;bandgt;Select squareandlt;/bandgt; - Use the mouse.
and andlt;bandgt;Switch between pencil/eraserandlt;/bandgt; - Spacebar
and andlt;bandgt;Input numberandlt;/bandgt; - 1 - 9 number keys

game.title: Domino Draw
game.controls:
and andlt;bandgt;Draw trail of dominoesandlt;/bandgt; - Use the mouse.
and andlt;bandgt;Topple dominoesandlt;/bandgt; - Press the andquot;Startandquot; button.
and andlt;bandgt;Create new trailandlt;/bandgt; - Press the andquot;Newandquot; button.

game.title: Street Hooligans
game.controls:
In this awesome flash game, your aim is to protect your territory by killing all the hooligans and clear every level to score maximum points. 

In order to do this, you need to avoid their attack otherwise they will reduce the energy and game will be over. Use energy and health potions where necessary, as they are limited. 


For killing every single hooligan you will receive 10 dollars, so use the money to purchase upgrades after every level. Also you can practice in free mode but dont forget to keep an eye on the energy and life status. Good Luck...

Controls:


	

		Movements
		WASD Keys
	
	
		Attack
		Left Mouse Click
	
	
		Super Power (Only for maximum energy)
		Space Bar
	
	
		Energy Potion
		Q Key
	
	
		Health Potion
		I Key

game.description: In Street Hooligans, kill horde after horde of thugs and hooligans in every level of this nice flash game and score as many points as you can. Earn points and cash to buy health potions and armour. You can even upgrade your weapons! Be careful though, there are even more bad guys as the difficulty increases! If the swarm is too much for you to take, you can always use a special move that’ll disperse them all, given you a momentary reprieve to prepare yourself for the next hurdle! Good luck!
game.instructions:
In this awesome flash game, your aim is to protect your territory by killing all the hooligans and clear every level to score maximum points. 

In order to do this, you need to avoid their attack otherwise they will reduce the energy and game will be over. Use energy and health potions where necessary, as they are limited. 


For killing every single hooligan you will receive 10 dollars, so use the money to purchase upgrades after every level. Also you can practice in free mode but dont forget to keep an eye on the energy and life status. Good Luck...

game.description: Jungle Crash is a Puzzle Game where you have to try to eliminate the blocks before they reach the top of the screen. To elimintate colors you need to click groups of 3 or more of the same color blocks. New blocks are contsantly adding from the bottom of the game. If any one of the stacks of blocks touches the top then it's game over. You have 10 lives and if you click a group of tiles that is less than 3, you lose one. As the levels progress the game gets harder because the speed of incoming blocks starts to increase.

game.description: Number is a Maths Game that will get your brain into gear. The aim of the game is to clear the board of all the numbers as quickly as possible.  A number appears on the right of the screen and you need to eliminate any number of blocks that add up to the number. The game is over when you can no longer make the number on your right with the numbers on the game board. Or if you clear the game and there are no numbers left on the board.

A tip is to hide in the bottom corners to avoid most of their bullets.

game.title: Air Hockey
game.controls:
Select your country and play against the other top teams of the world, beat them all and become the World Champion.

The first player to accumulate seven points wins the game. You win a point by hitting the puck in the opponents goal. The player who scores a point will have the possession of the puck for the next serve. The puck can be struck with any part of the mallet.

Use your Mouse to move your mallet and hit the puck.
game.description: Air hockey is one of everyone's favorite challenges! Represent your favorite country as you go head-to-head as you work your way through a tournament of eight games. Every country's player brings their own tactics and challenges, so stay alert. Some of the most realistic physics for air hockey are right here.
